Evyn, Novice Agent.name: Evyn, Novice Agent
Evyn, Novice Agent.evoEffect:
Storm.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Evyn, Novice Agent.baseFlair: Countless traps and snares, and all eyes on the lookout... Wait, whoa! I think I stepped on a trap... Oh geez, I've been compromised already!
Evyn, Novice Agent.evoFlair: I can still turn this around! I just gotta stay cool and collected—everything's clear to me now! Sorry to keep you waiting, Dei! I'll show you what I'm really capable of now!

Veiled Reckoning.name: Veiled Reckoning
Veiled Reckoning.baseEffect:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Put an Assassin into your hand.
Veiled Reckoning.baseFlair: I am the night's shadow—not even the moonlight reaches my flesh.

Erika's Sleight.name: Erika's Sleight
Erika's Sleight.baseFlair: I'll join the fight. These hands are stained with blood; they can't ever be scrubbed clean. But I won't stay stuck in the past. I need to move on—and take back my future.

Mistolina's Swordplay.name: Mistolina's Swordplay
Mistolina's Swordplay.baseEffect: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Mistolina's Swordplay.baseFlair: I do suppose it is my turn to leap into the fray! I may not be clever, and I certainly am not one to give inspiring speeches... But, at the very least, I know when to fight!

Bayleon's Command.name: Bayleon's Command
Bayleon's Command.baseFlair: I shall fight. I was foolish and ignorant—a ruler who didn't know the truth. But to my people, I am still a guiding light. I am the Forest King. And I will waver no longer. To arms!

Everlasting Castle.name: Everlasting Castle
Everlasting Castle.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Use X play points to put a random follower that costs X play points from your deck into play. X equals your remaining play points.
At the end of your turn, if it is your tenth turn or later, summon a Steelclad Knight.
Everlasting Castle.baseFlair: A castle snuffs out the flames of war. A soldier snuffs out sorrow.

Quickblader.name: Quickblader
Quickblader.baseFlair: Let's speed things up! I ain't got all day to wait for you to get good.
Quickblader.evoFlair: You didn't seriously think surrounding me was gonna work, did you? I got news for you then—this next part isn't gonna go well for you either.

Ninja Trainee.name: Ninja Trainee
Ninja Trainee.baseFlair: Any of you bums lookin' to mess with our village, you gotta go through me. Hey! Who just called me a runt! You lookin' to get a shuriken to the hea—Wait! Don't move!
Ninja Trainee.evoFlair: To all the bums lookin' to swindle our village, hop on outta here, 'cause me and my frog-style ninja skills say different. Now who just called me a toad? Show yourself!

Vanguard.name: Vanguard
Vanguard.baseFlair: A true warrior always leads the charge.
Vanguard.evoFlair: A true warrior always cuts off the enemy's retreat.

Wolf Fang Swordsman.name: Wolf Fang Swordsman
Wolf Fang Swordsman.baseFlair: One day, the rest of the pack will accept me as one of their own. There's no way I can lose here! Focus... I have to give it my all!
Wolf Fang Swordsman.evoFlair: One day, I'll fight alongside the rest of the pack. I just need to prove myself! Focus... Victory is near. I can feel it!

Axe Princess.name: Axe Princess
Axe Princess.baseEffect: Whenever you play a card using its Enhance effect, draw a card.
Axe Princess.baseFlair: I could never get into princess stuff. Everything's so hoity toity, so prim and proper. It just wasn't for me. But here, now, here I can lend a hand.
Axe Princess.evoFlair: I just can't bring myself to care about the small stuff. I was never good at dancing or knitting. But cleaving things in two? Now that's where I excel!

Lounes, Levin Apprentice.name: Lounes, Levin Apprentice
Lounes, Levin Apprentice.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Gain +0/+1 for each Levin card in your hand.
Enhance (3): Can attack 2 times per turn.
Lounes, Levin Apprentice.baseFlair:
Into the melee at lightning speed!
Look at me! I'm going to beat 'em up! Tah-ha! Eat lightning... Aaaah! I-I zapped myself!
Lounes, Levin Apprentice.evoFlair:
Rule 1. Make a cool entrance like Captain Albert!
Rule 2. Beat up the Sky Knight's enemies with lightning!
Rule 3. Be careful not to zap yourself!
—Lounes's Research Notes, "Practical Maxims"

Knight.name: Knight
Knight.baseFlair: I have chosen the way of the sword because there are things and people I wish to protect. Well, friend? Why have you chosen this path?
Knight.evoFlair: I have chosen the way of the sword because there are people and things I wish to protect. I wish to create a world where people coexist in harmony. It is sorrow I wish to destroy, not life.

Heavy Knight.name: Heavy Knight
Heavy Knight.baseFlair: We're surrounded? Heh-heh! Wonderful! We'll take them all out in one go!
Heavy Knight.evoFlair: What! Is that all you've got? Very well. Now it's my turn.

Shield Guardian.name: Shield Guardian
Shield Guardian.baseFlair: With this slab of shield, arrows will never reach me!
Shield Guardian.evoFlair: My brawn and my shield stop magic cold!

Sellsword Lucius.name: Sellsword Lucius
Sellsword Lucius.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Destroy an enemy follower.
Sellsword Lucius.baseFlair: After all these years honing my swordsmanship on goblins, I should be prepared for the battlefield. Despite that, swinging my blade against fellow humans still doesn't feel right.
Sellsword Lucius.evoFlair: A life lived by the sword isn't such an unpleasant prospect. There are still opponents out there with swords worth crossing.

Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.name: Ernesta, Weapons Hawker
Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.baseEffect: Fanfare: Rally (10) - Put a Dread Hound into your hand.
Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.baseFlair: Taking up arms constitutes a silent pact. The moment a weapon is in your hand, you've made your intentions clear. But if you insist, I'll happily keep my end of the bargain.
Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.evoFlair: The agreement is everything to a dealer. The terms and conditions, the parties involved—everything is executed exactly as stated. I suppose you've learned the hard way that it's best to read the fine print before you sign, hmm?

Dread Hound.name: Dread Hound
Dread Hound.baseEffect:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Give a random allied Ernesta, Weapons Hawker Last Words - Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
Dread Hound.baseFlair:
Hear that snarl? It's your one—and only—warning to back down. Try to lay a finger on me, and you'll be lucky if that's all you lose. Yes, this darling creature embodies everything I find ideal in a weapon.
—Ernesta, Weapons Hawker
Dread Hound.evoFlair:
If everyone had a weapon, everyone would be afraid to use them. I'd call that an effective deterrent to violence, not unlike our stalemate here.
—Ernesta, Weapons Hawker

Perseus.name: Perseus
Perseus.evoEffect: Evolve: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if there are at least 4 allied Swordcraft followers in play.
Perseus.baseFlair: Am I a god or a man? It's all the same to me! I'll become a legend and people will sing my praises!
Perseus.evoFlair: I'll overcome any trial! I'll take out any tribulation! My legend begins here—get ready to sing my praises!

Rapier Master.name: Rapier Master
Rapier Master.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (2) - Gain +1/+1.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1 more and Bane.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1 more and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +1/+1 more and Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain +1/+1 more.
Rapier Master.baseFlair: You're a ragged lot, all caked in mud and dust. Swords should be wielded with elegance. Watch and learn!
Rapier Master.evoFlair: What an utter disgrace you are. But take heart. This blade of mine will put an elegant end to your vulgar existence!

Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.name: Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (3) - Gain +2/+0 and Rush.
Last Words: If it is your turn, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon a Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade, evolve it, then remove this effect.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.evoEffect: Strike: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.baseFlair: I have drawn my blade from the scabbard called peace. We samurai have an obligation to make use of our skill. With this sword, I will cut down my enemies. That is the sole reason I exist.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.evoFlair: It is a disgrace for a samurai's blade to rust atop the tatami mat. Conversely, it is honorable for it to break upon the battlefield. Therefore, I will fight; I will cut down my enemies. That is the sole reason I exist.

Otohime's Bodyguard.name: Otohime's Bodyguard
Otohime's Bodyguard.baseFlair: I didn't think they'd let someone as tiny as me guard, but it turns out that Otohime can't stand to be around people taller than her!
Otohime's Bodyguard.evoFlair: What'll happen if I grow taller than Otohime? Don't tell me I'll get kicked out! Well, for the time I'm here I'll do everything I can to protect her.

Nano, the Dawnblade.name: Nano, the Dawnblade
Nano, the Dawnblade.baseFlair: I understand how you feel, Lecia. You're scared of seeing people get hurt, and you want to run away. Your heart is filled with pain... But you accept everything and continue moving forward! And because of all that, I choose to believe in you and lend you my power!
Nano, the Dawnblade.evoFlair: I am only kind because your heart is kind, Lecia. And my power only shines because your power shines as well. I offer you the full power of the Dawnblade! As long as we're together, we have nothing to fear!

Mentor's Teachings.name: Mentor's Teachings
Mentor's Teachings.baseEffect:
Give a follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Draw a card.
Mentor's Teachings.baseFlair: My precious child. May you always have both the strength to survive in this cruel world and the kindness to protect your allies from its evils.

Grand Auction.name: Grand Auction
Grand Auction.baseEffect:
Discard a card from your hand.
Draw a card.
Put an Ageworn Weaponry into your hand.
Grand Auction.baseFlair: As sparks fly between buyers and sellers, prices rise and fall like the tides of battle. But, then again, all's fair in love, war, and commerce.

Pompous Summons.name: Pompous Summons
Pompous Summons.baseEffect:
Put a random Swordcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Rally (10): Put 2 random Swordcraft followers into your hand instead.
Pompous Summons.baseFlair: "Her Royal Highness never orders us to do anything." A gaunt soldier stumbles out of the throne room, eyes hollowed with exhaustion. "She just makes a lot of... requests."

Gilded Blade.name: Gilded Blade
Gilded Blade.baseEffect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Gilded Blade.baseFlair: A dagger once passed down through a royal family—now little more than a bandit's negotiation implement.

Gilded Goblet.name: Gilded Goblet
Gilded Goblet.baseFlair: A chalice once prized by a famed general—now little more than a bandit's flask.

Gilded Boots.name: Gilded Boots
Gilded Boots.baseEffect: Give Rush to an allied follower.
Gilded Boots.baseFlair: A pair of shoes crafted by expert hands—now little more than a bandit's house slippers.

Gilded Necklace.name: Gilded Necklace
Gilded Necklace.baseFlair: A necklace once adored by a noblewoman—now little more than the string for a bandit's idle cat's cradle.

Accolade.name: Accolade
Accolade.baseEffect:
Give an allied follower Clash: Draw a card.
Change that follower into a Commander follower if they are an Officer follower.
Accolade.baseFlair: A good man hopes for justice, a knight upholds it. You knelt a man, now rise a knight.

King's Welcome.name: King's Welcome
King's Welcome.baseEffect:
Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from that card's cost. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
King's Welcome.baseFlair: One naturally expects a certain amount of honor from those who have won distinction in battle. Let honor be our guiding light. There's nothing that will keep our spirits higher in battle! —Splendid Fencer

Tempered Aether.name: Tempered Aether
Tempered Aether.baseEffect:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Tempered Aether.baseFlair:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the troop discovered her kindness on the battlefield, they saw a wild, valiant aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who seek savage strength.

Grand Acquisition.name: Grand Acquisition
Grand Acquisition.baseEffect:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Enhance (6): Put 1 of each into your hand instead and recover 6 play points.
Grand Acquisition.baseFlair:
He's just like a merchant who's come to buy goods. He evaluates each and every item and takes the ones that strike his fancy. The only difference is, he doesn't pay.
—Imperial castle guard

Fatal Spellbomb.name: Fatal Spellbomb
Fatal Spellbomb.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Fatal Spellbomb.baseFlair: This is what they call dirty payback for dirty deeds. —Valse, Magical Marksman

Chromatic Duel.name: Chromatic Duel
Chromatic Duel.baseEffect:
Choose: Put a Queen Hemera the White or Queen Magnus the Black into your hand.
Enhance (6): Put both into your hand instead, and recover 6 play points.
Chromatic Duel.baseFlair:
"I challenge you, Queen of Black!"
"Checkmate, King of White!" —King of White, Queen of Black

Meet the Levin Sisters!.name: Meet the Levin Sisters!
Meet the Levin Sisters!.baseEffect:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Mina, Levin Vice Leader
-Mona, Levin Mage
-Mena, Levin Duelist
Enhance (7): Put 1 of each into your hand instead, and recover 6 play points.
Meet the Levin Sisters!.baseFlair:
"The important thing's that you just start punching, right?"
"Girls who forget the strategy will get punished later!"
"Enough chatter, you two! We're on an operation!"
—Three Levin Sisters

Levin Justice.name: Levin Justice
Levin Justice.baseEffect: Put a Yurius, Levin Duke into your hand. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Levin cards in your hand.
Levin Justice.baseFlair:
I will save as many people as I can. That is my duty.
—Albert, Levin Champion

I will do my duty. That will save many lives.
—Yurius, Levin Duke

Decisive Strike.name: Decisive Strike
Decisive Strike.baseEffect:
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the highest-attack Commander follower in your hand.
Enhance (5): Deal X damage to all enemy followers instead.
Decisive Strike.baseFlair: Many storms rage on the battlefield, but he is the true eye of the tempest.

King's Might.name: King's Might
King's Might.baseEffect:
Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, give +2/+1 instead.
King's Might.baseFlair: I am the Forest King. And my blade will illuminate the forest.

Spring Cleaning.name: Spring Cleaning
Spring Cleaning.baseEffect:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the highest-cost cards in your hand. Then draw a card.
Spring Cleaning.baseFlair: Let's get rid of all this clutter!

Front Lines.name: Front Lines
Front Lines.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random allied Officer follower.
Front Lines.baseFlair: A knight knows no shame like wounds on her back. We know no way but forward.

Oathless Knight.name: Oathless Knight
Oathless Knight.baseFlair: Brothers and sisters, let steel and blade do the talking today! The front lines belong to us!
Oathless Knight.evoFlair: A battlefield knows no bounds; war invariably begets war. Submit to this verity, and fight until you can fight no more!

Kunoichi Trainee.name: Kunoichi Trainee
Kunoichi Trainee.baseFlair: Please! I, not her, am this village's number one kunoichi! You'd do well to remember it, too... All right, let's do thi—Hey! Are you even listening to me?
Kunoichi Trainee.evoFlair: You want proof I'm a cut above her? Fine! No one can resist my feminine wiles, you'll see. What? What do you mean, "No thanks"?

Fervid Soldier.name: Fervid Soldier
Fervid Soldier.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Commander card comes into play, gain +1/+0 until the end of your turn.
Fervid Soldier.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Commander card comes into play, gain +1/+0 until the end of your turn.
Fervid Soldier.baseFlair: I will fight! For my land, my family, and, above all, my cherished friends!
Fervid Soldier.evoFlair: His final breath as I cradled his limp, cold body haunts me to this day—"Live..." And so I shall in his stead!

Palace Fencer.name: Palace Fencer
Palace Fencer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
Palace Fencer.baseFlair: We privileged are sworn to a lifelong duty of shepherding the weak. Follow me and see that I honor my pledge!
Palace Fencer.evoFlair: Whatever hellish eventuality lies ahead, I will retreat from no evil. Not as long as royal blood flows through these veins!

Cyclone Soldier.name: Cyclone Soldier
Cyclone Soldier.baseFlair: No beast has stood its ground against my wind-imbued blade!
Cyclone Soldier.evoFlair: Years of training have led me to this day. Now feel the full force of my elemental mastery!

Centaur Vanguard.name: Centaur Vanguard
Centaur Vanguard.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Storm if an allied Commander card is in play.
Centaur Vanguard.baseFlair: The front lines serve as this elite centaur's stomping ground. Many a fortress has trembled at the mere sight of his dragonscale spear.
Centaur Vanguard.evoFlair: To hear the centaur's name is enough to fill any enemy with a dread so fierce their capitulation is all but guaranteed. The beast's unwavering force and conviction claimed victory in much haste.

Veteran Lancer.name: Veteran Lancer
Veteran Lancer.baseFlair: Allow me the honor of carving passage through their front line, for I can think no higher purpose for my lance and myself!
Veteran Lancer.evoFlair: This lance will guide my allies onward to victory! As long as I stand, there is nothing to fear!

Fearless Banneret.name: Fearless Banneret
Fearless Banneret.baseEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, summon a Knight.
Fearless Banneret.evoEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, summon a Knight.
Fearless Banneret.baseFlair: Fearless warriors! Rally to my flag!
Fearless Banneret.evoFlair: Come to me, my brothers and sisters! Under my flag, we march onward to glory!

Samurai.name: Samurai
Samurai.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Bane if 3 or more enemy followers are in play.
Samurai.baseFlair: No matter how many come to challenge me, they'll all end up as rust on my sword!
Samurai.evoFlair: It's quite a trick to stay a step ahead of my sword! But if you care to try, come and get me, mighty general!

Naval Guard Simone.name: Naval Guard Simone
Naval Guard Simone.baseFlair: These blue seas are ours. By my blade and my uniform, I will end the monsters that pollute these waters to the depths!
Naval Guard Simone.evoFlair: Monsters are nothing to worry about, as I am a shining star in the royal navy! These waters belong to us, and none can stand against me here!

Holy Bear Knight.name: Holy Bear Knight
Holy Bear Knight.baseFlair: I picked him up on the side of the road. Figured, why not, I'll teach him a trick or two. But you should've seen my face when he figured out how to hold a sword. —A chivalric order member
Holy Bear Knight.evoFlair: Guess I picked him up on a whim. But, wow, that bear is something! I'd like to see any human do tricks like him. My guard's up, though; I'll tell you that. —A chivalric order member

Tycoon.name: Tycoon
Tycoon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Then draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
Tycoon.baseFlair: I used to be a lily-livered brat, utterly terrified of everything around me. But look at me now! I fear nothing! Here, you can have this—pick it up! Now kiss the ring!
Tycoon.evoFlair: Those same charlatans that once laughed at and made a fool of me... now they try to butter me up with their phony pleasantries! Ha! Money is power—an absolute power that can't be denied by anyone!

Servant of Usurpation.name: Servant of Usurpation
Servant of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Clash: Gain +1/+1. Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Servant of Usurpation.baseFlair: Take and take again. If it has merit, it's ours; if it has value, it's ours. Seize everything, leave nothing.
Servant of Usurpation.evoFlair:
The First Step: Remember
Whether riches concealed or riches revealed, the wealth of this world belongs to us. Remember this.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

Ernesta, Magic Dealer.name: Ernesta, Magic Dealer
Ernesta, Magic Dealer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.
Ernesta, Magic Dealer.baseFlair: There are many types of merchants. Clothes merchants, fruit sellers, landlords. I am none of those. What I sell is violence. I'm a warmonger.
Ernesta, Magic Dealer.evoFlair: If you want world peace, you need the power to create balance. Laugh all you want; I know it's a strange thing for an arms dealer to say. But you'll thank me when you leave this battlefield alive.

Cybercannoneer.name: Cybercannoneer
Cybercannoneer.baseFlair: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a soldier on the battlefield. The strange components incorporated into the cannon exhibited fearsome performance. —Commander's Report, Part 1
Cybercannoneer.evoFlair: It was purely accidental, but this new weapon has achieved even greater results than we expected. The recharging time could be improved though, since it allows enemies to approach. —Battle Log, Part 1

Dauntless Commander.name: Dauntless Commander
Dauntless Commander.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4 and give +0/+2 to all other allied followers.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, give it +0/+2.
Dauntless Commander.evoEffect: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, give it +0/+2.
Dauntless Commander.baseFlair: Do not falter! Victory is still within our reach, so long as we stand our ground. Past this battle, an era of peace awaits!
Dauntless Commander.evoFlair: There is nothing to fear! Put your faith in me. A true warrior wears an injury on the battlefield like a badge of pride. The path to peace dwells within a soul that is patient and unyielding!

Levin Archer.name: Levin Archer
Levin Archer.evoEffect: Evolve: If there are any Levin cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Levin Archer.baseFlair: The whole reason I joined the Sky Knights was to fight alongside the super cute captain... And now I have to serve in the rear guard?
Levin Archer.evoFlair: The only part of the captain I can see is his back. The only things I get a good look at are those dopey opponents. Sigh, happiness is a long way away...

Lupine Axeman.name: Lupine Axeman
Lupine Axeman.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, recover 1 play point.
Lupine Axeman.baseFlair:
Your halberd strikes are more fearsome than savage claws which tear into hapless prey! Every swing of your axe rends foes in two! We beastfolk have awoken to our true nature and shall reign supreme!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
Lupine Axeman.evoFlair:
Your halberd strikes are more fearsome than savage claws which tear into hapless prey! As learned as humans may be, their actions reek of foolishness! Meanwhile we embrace both our savagery and wit!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

Samurai Outlaw.name: Samurai Outlaw
Samurai Outlaw.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and evolve this follower.
Clash: Gain +1/+1.
Samurai Outlaw.baseFlair:
To war. Large and small combined, thirty battles break out. Samurai of every region, every army, have their own unique fighting styles. As well as their own secret techniques.
—Takenaga Era, Year 0: Fierce Battle
Samurai Outlaw.evoFlair:
As the thirty battles converge into ten, the conflict becomes increasingly violent. The ruthless war becomes a whetstone upon which the samurai hone their skill.
—Hanori Era, Year 6: Escalating Turmoil

Gizmo Courier.name: Gizmo Courier
Gizmo Courier.baseEffect: Fanfare: If you have at least 3 other Officer cards in your hand, gain +2/+0 and Rush. If you have at least 3 other Machina cards in your hand, draw a card.
Gizmo Courier.baseFlair:
The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered by a straggling soldier. Parts of it can be used to enhance weaponry and transport methods. This development should increase our resupply efficiency by leaps.
—Veteran Commander's Report
Gizmo Courier.evoFlair:
To fight like the beastfolk—relying on individual talent—is too unpredictable a stratagem. A homogeneous, replaceable force erases this inconsistency. In war, victory goes to those who can produce the greater numbers.
—Distinguished Sergeant

Honorable Thief.name: Honorable Thief
Honorable Thief.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Rally (7) - Evolve this follower.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
Honorable Thief.evoEffect: Last Words: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
Honorable Thief.baseFlair:
Your Majesty and noble guards:
Tomorrow, when the moon's at its peak, I'll come for your valuables. I'll invade from the front gate and slip through the hidden corridor via the throne room. I look forward to our transaction. —Honorable Thief's Tip-off Note
Honorable Thief.evoFlair:
Just leave that honest thief be. There's no point in hiring protection. He's gone out of his way to politely tell us his plans and is still confident he can pull off his heist.
—Lord of a Neighboring Country

Steelclad Knight.name: Steelclad Knight
Steelclad Knight.baseFlair: They call me the Knight of Steel, and my loyalty to my master is as firm and unbending as that metal itself.
Steelclad Knight.evoFlair: My faith is as hard and unwavering as steel. My will to fight shall never falter.

Buccaneer.name: Buccaneer
Buccaneer.baseEffect:
Drain.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Goblet into your hand.
Buccaneer.baseFlair: I swore to the cap'n I'd do as I please. It's the queen I obey, but that's my own choice. Get in my way and I'll cut ya down without mercy.
Buccaneer.evoFlair:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: do as you please.
"Obey or not—the choice is always yours! You're the one who steers through the seaways!"

Cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer.baseEffect:
Rush.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
Cannoneer.baseFlair: I swore to the cap'n I'd be strong. That's how I got it in my head—I'd be a thundering wave of strength. Lemme show you what me and this cannon can do!
Cannoneer.evoFlair:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: be strong.
"Use your own power to stand tall on the sea! Never let your strength waver!"

Marine Raider.name: Marine Raider
Marine Raider.baseEffect:
Follower Strike: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Blade into your hand.
Marine Raider.baseFlair: I swore to the cap'n I'd be chaos incarnate. I'd shatter the fetters o' the law 'n' do whatever I want on the seas! Now here's where I go my own way!
Marine Raider.evoFlair:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: be chaos incarnate.
"We are pirates, the wreakers of havoc! Rules and manners are meant to be drowned!"

Maid Leader.name: Maid Leader
Maid Leader.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
Maid Leader.baseFlair: His Lordship will be home any minute! All staff to their stations at once!
Maid Leader.evoFlair: His Lordship has arrived! I want to see smiles so wide you blind him with your pearly whites, people!

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give Ambush to an allied Commander follower.
Assassin.baseFlair: By all means, follow your precious rules of engagement. Let's just see who walks away life intact.
Assassin.evoFlair: With deadened movement and obscured approach, I take the life of my foe. I wonder, do you even know what it means to go to war?

Luminous Knight.name: Luminous Knight
Luminous Knight.evoEffect: Evolve: Give all other allied followers +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Luminous Knight.baseFlair: The Luminous Knights will not rest until the forces of foulness crawl back from whence they came. Blessed Light, guide us, and may our ever-burning hope stay the darkness!
Luminous Knight.evoFlair: Hear this solemn vow. By the holy light of my sword and armor, and the hopes and dreams of those I swore to protect, I do declare that no evil shall escape my wrath today!

Princess Vanguard.name: Princess Vanguard
Princess Vanguard.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a 1-play point allied follower.
Princess Vanguard.baseFlair: Exhausted already, eh rookie? Disgraceful! Such lethargy is sure to prevent you from ever becoming a knight worthy of the name!
Princess Vanguard.evoFlair: The battlefield is a brutal place, and your enemies will not wait for you to become a worthy warrior. Now come! Let us fight together!

Gunner Maid Seria.name: Gunner Maid Seria
Gunner Maid Seria.evoEffect: Evolve: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Commander card is in play.
Gunner Maid Seria.baseFlair: My job's to stay at your side, Princess. I can't very well let you travel on your own!
Gunner Maid Seria.evoFlair: Something tells me that she's in trouble. I'm on my way, Princess. Me and my rifle can keep you safe!

Gelt, Vice Captain.name: Gelt, Vice Captain
Gelt, Vice Captain.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if you have a Commander card in play.
Gelt, Vice Captain.baseFlair: Amelia is doing everything she can to carry this order. What kind of man would I be not to do my part?
Gelt, Vice Captain.evoFlair: All of us want to do everything we can to back Amelia up. That means training every single day! The knightly order of Amelia won't back down from any challenge!

Bladed Hedgehog.name: Bladed Hedgehog
Bladed Hedgehog.baseEffect: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Bladed Hedgehog.evoEffect: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Bladed Hedgehog.baseFlair: This hedgehog is considered a dangerous nuisance by warriors in battle. The mysterious beast is reputed to gnaw on blades.
Bladed Hedgehog.evoFlair: The bladed hedgehog seeks battlefields where it might find quality swords. Soldiers who accidentally step on the beast have been known to desert shortly afterward.

Cuhullin.name: Cuhullin
Cuhullin.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain Bane until the end of the turn. Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Cuhullin.baseFlair: Although this warrior is the progeny of a god, he is a reckless mad dog. He wanders an eternal battlefield, wielding both secret runes and formidable spearplay.
Cuhullin.evoFlair: The magic spear he wields is called Gáe Bulg. It always pierces its target, even if that target is a god. When he draws this weapon, his opponents can expect to die an honorable death.

Homebound Mercenary.name: Homebound Mercenary
Homebound Mercenary.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+2.
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to this follower.
Homebound Mercenary.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to this follower.
Homebound Mercenary.baseFlair: If I were just in it for the cash, I wouldn't mind dying. But this is for my home—my country! I mustn't perish here, for I must return someday to the land I love.
Homebound Mercenary.evoFlair: Being a soldier has never been easy, but I'll do what I must for my homeland. For someone awaits my return, and love has only given me strength!

Savage Swordsman.name: Savage Swordsman
Savage Swordsman.baseFlair: Yup, I'm from the country all right. But I'm a hell of a fighter if my pa was. I bet I can show you thing or two!
Savage Swordsman.evoFlair: Yup, I'm from the country all right. My ma fed me good, so I grew up big and tough. I know one thing though: I ain't about to lose to no city boy!

Splendid Fencer.name: Splendid Fencer
Splendid Fencer.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Give an allied Officer follower +1/+0.
Enhance (5): Give that follower Storm.
Splendid Fencer.baseFlair:
"On my honor, I vow to fight fair and upright!"
Standing before the treacherous enemy, she refuses to bend. Her stance stokes the battle spirit of her students.
"We can't let that bunch of cowards harm our leader!"
Splendid Fencer.evoFlair:
"Listen, everyone! From here on, we're going elegantly!"
In response to their master's call, the soldiers push through their predicament and secure an honorable victory.
"A cheer for our leader!"

Jeno, Levin Stalwart.name: Jeno, Levin Stalwart
Jeno, Levin Stalwart.baseEffect: Can evolve an allied Levin follower (excluding Jeno, Levin Stalwart) each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
Jeno, Levin Stalwart.baseFlair: There's only one thing we need to do: light the fires of courage in our chest to cut through this battlefield!
Jeno, Levin Stalwart.evoFlair: He forcefully swings a steel axe to clear the path. Fighting resolutely in the vanguard, he fills the order members' chests with courage. —Levin Warriors, Chapter 4

Valse, Champion Deadeye.name: Valse, Champion Deadeye
Valse, Champion Deadeye.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Valse, Champion Deadeye.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Valse, Champion Deadeye.baseFlair: I have a one-track mind. Once I've set my sights on you, you're as good as done for. Now, now, pretty lady, won't you give me your hand? Feel the kiss of hot lead across your knuckles.
Valse, Champion Deadeye.evoFlair: Time your breaths the way you would match your steps to the beat of a waltz. Your finger slides over the trigger the way my arm slips around your waist. Oh, don't be afraid. Maybe a little peck on the forehead will comfort you.

Twinsword Master.name: Twinsword Master
Twinsword Master.baseEffect: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Twinsword Master.baseFlair:
The shogun is replaced, and the long war is now in the past. At the start of a new era that wishes for eternal peace, antiwar laws are passed.
—Eiwa Era, Year 0: Antiwar Laws
Twinsword Master.evoFlair:
The renouncement of war means that fighting will never take place again. Samurai are unnecessary in a world without war. The shogun orders them to abandon their swords and their names.
—Eiwa Era, Year 1: Peaceful Proclamation

Panther Scout.name: Panther Scout
Panther Scout.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Recover 1 play point.
Enhance (8): Gain +3/+3 and recover 7 play points instead.
Panther Scout.baseFlair:
"She moved with great stealth, like a whisper wrapped in night!"
"No matter your secrets, she'll keep the facts hidden!"
"Displays great skill!" "Wild as they come!"
—Satisfied Customers
Panther Scout.evoFlair:
The soldiers who've adopted steel weaponry are nothing more than a hivemind. Erase the individual and the pack weakens—utter buffoonery. When it comes to warfare, victory goes to those who can best mobilize their talent.
—Beast General

Levin Beastmaster.name: Levin Beastmaster
Levin Beastmaster.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon 2 White Tigers and change them into Levin followers.
Levin Beastmaster.evoEffect: Evolve: Summon a White Tiger and change it into a Levin follower.
Levin Beastmaster.baseFlair:
"I didn't make friends with this beasty till after I joined the order, but I've got her eating out of the palm of my hand now."
"Grrr..."
Levin Beastmaster.evoFlair:
"Grrr..."
(She's careless, inattentive, and bad at directions. And she thinks I'm the pet.)

Maisy, Red Riding Hood.name: Maisy, Red Riding Hood
Maisy, Red Riding Hood.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower if an allied Neutral follower is in play.
Maisy, Red Riding Hood.baseFlair: I'm off to take a basket of bread and wine to Grandmother. Good thing this nice wolf is helping me through the dark, scary woods. Thank you, wolf!
Maisy, Red Riding Hood.evoFlair: Thanks for taking me this far, wolf. Let me say thanks by finishing you off in just a second. Hey, why are you fighting back? You'll just suffer more!

Lux, Solar Lancer.name: Lux, Solar Lancer
Lux, Solar Lancer.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Put a random Commander card that costs 5 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Then put a random Commander card that costs at least 6 play points from your deck into your hand.
Lux, Solar Lancer.baseFlair: Even if clouds cover the sky, just behind them the sun is always shining. Fear not the dark clouds. Trust in the light and then I'll give you my strength during battle.
Lux, Solar Lancer.evoFlair: Feel the pulsing sun—it will be your strength! I will release my light and disperse the dark clouds that cover the battlefield!

Noble Chancellor.name: Noble Chancellor
Noble Chancellor.baseEffect: Whenever you play a card using its Enhance effect, recover 1 play point.
Noble Chancellor.evoEffect: Whenever you play a card using its Enhance effect, recover 1 play point.
Noble Chancellor.baseFlair: Some have died for this country and some live for it. As the people's ruler, I vow to bring peace to the dead and prosperity to the living.
Noble Chancellor.evoFlair: There is both good and evil in this country. I have a great love for it all, and swear to its citizens—until my final day, I will do everything in my power to move us to a brighter tomorrow.

Innocent Princess Prim.name: Innocent Princess Prim
Innocent Princess Prim.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +3/+3. Put a Nonja, Silent Maid into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Innocent Princess Prim.baseFlair: I'm the princess. But there's so much I don't know, and my father never lets me leave this castle.
Innocent Princess Prim.evoFlair: There's so much I don't know, but someday! Someday I'll be a great leader! And guide everyone in this kingdom!

Dario, Demon Count.name: Dario, Demon Count
Dario, Demon Count.baseEffect:
If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells and effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Dario, Demon Count.baseFlair: Were I to die, this counthood would go with me. And I'm not about to let that happen. Even if it costs me my humanity, I will live on!
Dario, Demon Count.evoFlair: I've been special since the day I was born. Not like you rabble! Natural lifespan? Heaven's will? What do those mean to me? All will bend and bow down as I say!

Leod, the Crescent Blade.name: Leod, the Crescent Blade
Leod, the Crescent Blade.evoEffect:
Ambush.
Evolve: Put a Veiled Reckoning into your hand.
Leod, the Crescent Blade.baseFlair: My blade is truth. Other people's concept of justice is nothing but lies. We Countersolari are united by our mission. We will fell the false sun and bring new glory to the true moon.
Leod, the Crescent Blade.evoFlair: On that day, when I saw the remains of my once-lively daughter, I renounced rebellion. I can no longer see the moon which once lit my path. I live for vengeance. For the day when I will fell the sun.

Steadfast Samurai.name: Steadfast Samurai
Steadfast Samurai.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.
Clash: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Steadfast Samurai.evoEffect:
Storm.
Clash: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Your leader has the following effect: Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Steadfast Samurai.baseFlair:
There were once samurai in this world, but now only fools remain. They possess no names, no swords. They are no more than lifeless husks who obey the shogun's orders.
—Eiwa Era, Year 58: Wartime Relics
Steadfast Samurai.evoFlair:
All their training amounts to nothing. Even the children sing songs that mock them. But still they continue to train aimlessly, as though merely fulfilling their duty, whatever that may be.
—Eiwa Era, Year 59: Fool's Wish

Pompous Prince.name: Pompous Prince
Pompous Prince.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to an allied Officer follower.
Pompous Prince.evoEffect: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all Officer followers in your deck.
Pompous Prince.baseFlair:
"Any subject deemed rubbish shall be exiled posthaste."
That was the decree His Highness made the day I joined the guard. Though I was the child of a criminal, I knew I'd found my place when I wasn't expelled from the order.
—Royal Guard's Diary
Pompous Prince.evoFlair:
"You will find no rubbish in this kingdom of mine."
We all erupted into cheers—a true blessing it was, to watch his coronation. His Majesty speaks plainly, but long may he reign.
—Kingdom Knight's Diary

Lilje, Butler of the Mists.name: Lilje, Butler of the Mists
Lilje, Butler of the Mists.baseEffect:
Ward.
Last Words: Put an Azord, Duke of the Mists (without Accelerate) into your hand.
Lilje, Butler of the Mists.baseFlair: Welcome to Lord Azord's manor. I am Lilje, a butler in service to Lord Azord. Now then, prepare for battle. I will determine whether you are worthy of my lord deigning to duel you.
Lilje, Butler of the Mists.evoFlair: Well, well. Your skill is tremendous. So tremendous, in fact, that my forgotten ambition has been reawakened. I have changed my mind. Regretfully, you will not be fighting against my lord. Why, you ask? I will not be letting you go until I have had my fill of fun.

Sheena, Maid of the Mists.name: Sheena, Maid of the Mists
Sheena, Maid of the Mists.baseEffect:
Bane.
Last Words: Put an Azord, Duke of the Mists (without Accelerate) into your hand.
Sheena, Maid of the Mists.baseFlair: Welcome to Lord Azord's manor. I am Sheena, a maid in service to Lord Azord. Now then, prepare for battle. I will determine whether you are worthy of my lord deigning to duel you.
Sheena, Maid of the Mists.evoFlair: Hm. I see. I have a grasp of your skill level now. I am pleased to inform you that you passed the test. I will lead you to Lord Azord. I will be sure to tell him that you are worthy of his full power.

Mina, Levin Vice Leader.name: Mina, Levin Vice Leader
Mina, Levin Vice Leader.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random Levin follower from your deck into your hand.
Mina, Levin Vice Leader.baseFlair: I'm Mina, vice leader of the Sky Knights! One of my duties is to give guidance to the other members. Don't be shy—Ask for a hand any time you need it!
Mina, Levin Vice Leader.evoFlair: She's a cornerstone of the Sky Knights, as reliable as they come. Though once in a while, she can be a little rigid. —Albert, Levin Champion

Sky Commander Celia.name: Sky Commander Celia
Sky Commander Celia.baseEffect: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Celia, Hope's Strategist or Celia, Despair's Messenger.
Sky Commander Celia.baseFlair: With me in charge there can be no question of the outcome. Each and every one of us will return home safely. Now let us begin!
Sky Commander Celia.evoFlair: It's a great honor to command this air brigade. Watch here now as I invoke the undefeated legacy of Captain Walfrid!

Unbridled Fury.name: Unbridled Fury
Unbridled Fury.baseEffect: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.

Usurping Spineblade.name: Usurping Spineblade
Usurping Spineblade.baseEffect:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Usurping Spineblade.baseFlair: Go ahead, hunger. Once the craving overtakes you, claim what is rightfully yours. That is the true way of the world, after all.

Godsent Stride.name: Godsent Stride
Godsent Stride.baseEffect: Give +0/+1, Rush, and Bane to an allied follower.
Godsent Stride.baseFlair: The pipes which heralded the war's opening salvos now play a lilting song of victory.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.baseEffect: Choose an allied follower in play and summon a copy of it. Give it Rush, and banish it at the start of your next turn.
Mirror Image.baseFlair:
1. Make the proper hand seals in order.
2. Divide your consciousness between all your clones.
3. Try not to squabble with them.
—Mirror Image Scroll

Conscription.name: Conscription
Conscription.baseEffect:
Put a random Officer card from your deck into your hand.
Put 1 more into your hand if an allied Commander card is in play.

Whole-Souled Swing.name: Whole-Souled Swing
Whole-Souled Swing.baseEffect:
If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, summon a Knight.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Whole-Souled Swing.baseFlair: I'll rend the field asunder with a single swing!

Shield of Flame.name: Shield of Flame
Shield of Flame.baseEffect:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 6 damage instead if an allied follower with Ambush is in play.
Shield of Flame.baseFlair: Smear the pulverized dragon scales and a single hair from a spiny desert lizard, and then leave them overnight. Enchant the mixture the following morning, and then ignite. —Book of Flame, Treatise on Arcane Ninjutsu

Armor of the Stars.name: Armor of the Stars
Armor of the Stars.baseEffect: Give an allied follower resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects and +0/+2.
Armor of the Stars.baseFlair: Armor forged from a fallen fragment of a distant star, its shine isn't typical of regular iron. Instead it twinkles with the splendor of the heavens.

Ivory Sword Dance.name: Ivory Sword Dance
Ivory Sword Dance.baseEffect:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Enhance (5): Before dealing damage, give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Ivory Sword Dance.baseFlair: Flowers in the wild blossom beneath peace and sunlight. Flowers on the battlefield bloom atop triumph and glory.

Shield Phalanx.name: Shield Phalanx
Shield Phalanx.baseEffect:
Summon a Shield Guardian and Knight.
Rally (15): Summon a Frontguard General instead of a Shield Guardian.
Shield Phalanx.baseFlair: Stand firm against the enemy. On our pride as noble knights, none shall pass so long as we draw breath.

Frostwing Spear.name: Frostwing Spear
Frostwing Spear.baseEffect: Give an unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Frostwing Spear.baseFlair:
You cowards who fear the flame will freeze by my spear.
—Otus of the Aloadae

Elegance in Action.name: Elegance in Action
Elegance in Action.baseEffect:
Draw a card. Summon a Heavy Knight for each follower drawn. Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower for each non-follower drawn.
Enhance (5): Draw 3 cards instead.
Elegance in Action.baseFlair: Visitors to the mansion always depart with an item gifted in apology.

Infiltration.name: Infiltration
Infiltration.baseEffect: Draw until you have X cards in your hand. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
Infiltration.baseFlair: Holding your breath? That's how amateurs do it. No need for that if you can just fade into the shadows... —Dei, Secret Agent

Princess's Strike.name: Princess's Strike
Princess's Strike.baseEffect:
Randomly deal 3 damage to an enemy follower with the highest attack in play. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, deal 5 damage instead.
Give Storm to a random allied Mistolina, Forest Princess.
Princess's Strike.baseFlair: I wouldn't look down upon me if I were you. I'm quite capable with the blade, you see.

Ironwrought Fortress.name: Ironwrought Fortress
Ironwrought Fortress.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Commander card comes into play, summon a Heavy Knight.
Ironwrought Fortress.baseFlair: Impregnable is the fortress defended by armor and wills of steel.

Ageworn Weaponry.name: Ageworn Weaponry
Ageworn Weaponry.baseEffect:
If an allied Swordcraft follower is in play, and you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Greatshield or Greatsword.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Knight.
Ageworn Weaponry.baseFlair: Love. The poets sing of it in words, but warriors show it with their blades. The nobility indulge upon it like wine, but the warrior protects it with shields. —War, Chapter 1

Greatshield.name: Greatshield
Greatshield.baseEffect:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied Swordcraft follower +0/+1.
Last Words: Summon a Shield Guardian.
Greatshield.baseFlair: Protect love with that shield, and grasp your hands around tomorrow. —War, Chapter 2

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.baseEffect:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied Swordcraft follower +1/+0.
Last Words: Summon a Heavy Knight.
Greatsword.baseFlair: Forge your blade with love, and cut a path to tomorrow. —War, Chapter 3

Ascetic Knight.name: Ascetic Knight
Ascetic Knight.baseFlair: Think nothing of my swordsmanship. Pay no heed to my armor. But malign those whom I call friends at your peril.
Ascetic Knight.evoFlair: Safety is found in solidarity, and from it is born unparalleled power. Yes, comradeship trumps all, and I am living proof of it.

Fencer.name: Fencer
Fencer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to an allied Officer follower.
Fencer.baseFlair: No, no, no! You dare to call yourself a knight of the realm with posture like that? Stand firm and advance like you mean it!
Fencer.evoFlair: Ever felt the steely tip of a rapier piercing your breast? Keep slacking off and you shall!

Novice Trooper.name: Novice Trooper
Novice Trooper.baseFlair: Fly my steed! The battlefield awaits!
Novice Trooper.evoFlair: Fear itself cowers at the sight of me and my mighty steed!

Snippy Gardener.name: Snippy Gardener
Snippy Gardener.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Commander card is in play.
Snippy Gardener.baseFlair: Have no fear, Master. Intruders shall soon be trimmed down to size. It'll only take two snips.
Snippy Gardener.evoFlair: Our roses are nourished with the fresh blood of intruders. Little wonder they are such a brilliant scarlet color.

Swift Infiltrator.name: Swift Infiltrator
Swift Infiltrator.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ambush if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Swift Infiltrator.baseFlair: Silently I'll strike, and my blade will be your grave marker.
Swift Infiltrator.evoFlair: You'll never hear me coming. An attack from me is a better going away present than you deserve.

Blitz Lancer.name: Blitz Lancer
Blitz Lancer.baseFlair: So all I gotta do is demolish the fortress? As you wish, commander! I'll be back in a jiffy!
Blitz Lancer.evoFlair: There's no need to worry, regardless of how tough the fighting gets. I'll just bring back the head of the enemy general! Problem solved!

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.baseFlair: Whoa now, watch where you're going. It's like you're begging to get robbed.
Thief.evoFlair: Whoa now, watch where you're going. This time you only lost your wallet, but next time it'll be your life!

Rabbit Ear Attendant.name: Rabbit Ear Attendant
Rabbit Ear Attendant.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied Neutral cards in play.
Rabbit Ear Attendant.baseFlair: You over there, and you over there! Everyone, hurry up! If we delay the banquet, the queen will lop off our heads!
Rabbit Ear Attendant.evoFlair: After a lot of hopping around, we finally got this place in order. Hurry on to the next task or the queen will lop off our heads!

Flail Knight.name: Flail Knight
Flail Knight.baseEffect: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Flail Knight.evoEffect: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Flail Knight.baseFlair: This is the flail of destruction. It pierces the wind like a meteorite and incinerates everything in its path!
Flail Knight.evoFlair: This is the flail of devotion. This technique was passed down to me from my late father—get a taste of it!

Merchantette.name: Merchantette
Merchantette.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Give +3/+2 instead.
Merchantette.baseFlair: Oh, a customer? I'll give you a discount—take a look at this merch!
Merchantette.evoFlair: I've got all kinds of bargains for you! Remember, the customer's always right! If they can pay, of course.

Master Samurai.name: Master Samurai
Master Samurai.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +2/+2. Can attack 2 times per turn.
Master Samurai.baseFlair: The war field is a monster that feeds on life. If you can't cut down one old man, then you have no right to stand here. Let me see you transcend my two blades, youngblood!
Master Samurai.evoFlair: What can be learned from the blade, the blade will teach you. This is the way of the war field. Contend with me, youngblood, or my two blades will fell you!

Tanya, Shadow Enforcer.name: Tanya, Shadow Enforcer
Tanya, Shadow Enforcer.baseFlair: Who are you? Having someone else here complicates things. Sorry, but I need you to disappear.
Tanya, Shadow Enforcer.evoFlair: I'm sorry I jumped to conclusions. And, um, about earlier... I actually meant that you should run away. I'm, uh, not great with words...

Weathered Vanguard.name: Weathered Vanguard
Weathered Vanguard.baseFlair: I've got no name for meself, no title to claim. But even though me hair's gone white, I'm still a frontline soldier. Easy too, when yer sword arm's strong as mine. You young green swords, you'd better follow me on the battlefield.
Weathered Vanguard.evoFlair: You don't come back from a bunch o' wars without dodgin' ol' death more than yer fair share. Now that me beard's gone white, I'm a silver wolf on the front lines. Easy too, when your bite is bigger than your bark. You young green swords, you'd better follow me lead.

Wardog.name: Wardog
Wardog.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Wardog.baseFlair: This fella was abandoned. I taught 'im to fight for survival. Watch out—it really hurts when he sinks his teeth into ya. —Adoptive Guardian
Wardog.evoFlair: He's an even better soldier'n me, now. If you meet him on the battlefield, look sharp. He eats new recruits for breakfast. —Adoptive Guardian

Phantom Assassin.name: Phantom Assassin
Phantom Assassin.baseFlair: This world is a sea of carnage, a never-ending hell. Though the path I travel may be littered with corpses, I wouldn't have it any other way. Killing is simply necessary for survival.
Phantom Assassin.evoFlair: Protecting the innocent is an arduous task. I have cut short the lives of beasts and humans alike, but... raising an orphaned child is no simple feat. They can be taken from you in an instant, but protecting them is a lifelong commitment.

Veteran Vagabond Frog.name: Veteran Vagabond Frog
Veteran Vagabond Frog.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Enhance (6): Gain +2/+2.
Veteran Vagabond Frog.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, gain Ambush.
Veteran Vagabond Frog.baseFlair: It's nice going from A to B, but you've got to love the scenic route. The wind's as free a thing as you'll find. It just flutters to and fro then drifts on by. What do you say we take it as easy as the breeze?
Veteran Vagabond Frog.evoFlair: A wayfarer rescued the captive princess. He was neither human nor frog—and he simply viewed himself as a knight. Hiding himself skillfully, this covert knight lays waste to the wicked. —A Traveler in Search of Self

Adept Thief.name: Adept Thief
Adept Thief.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Gilded Boots or Gilded Necklace into your hand.
Adept Thief.baseFlair: An eye for an eye? Hah! Try a thief for a thief! No hard feelings, pal—I'm just here to do a job. You'll be giving back the royal treasure one way or another!
Adept Thief.evoFlair: It takes a thief to catch a thief! Whew, it sure is nice to be the good guy once in a while. I'll take gratitude and praise in place of treasure... this time.

Fox Lancer.name: Fox Lancer
Fox Lancer.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 1 play point.
When this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, gain Storm.
Fox Lancer.evoEffect: When this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, gain Storm.
Fox Lancer.baseFlair:
"He can spring on his prey from a tremendous distance!"
"His tactics allow him to pierce the gap, making his enemy an easy mark!"
"Show them how a wild beast fights!"
—Group of warrior admirers
Fox Lancer.evoFlair:
"He can spring upon his prey from a tremendous distance!"
"His legs don't stop moving until his target falls!"
"Seize victory with the power of the wilds!"
—Group of warrior admirers

Nightclad Assassin.name: Nightclad Assassin
Nightclad Assassin.baseFlair: These streets are my cloak. Duck into an alleyway, and you can get the drop on any mark. There's no escape—not on my turf.
Nightclad Assassin.evoFlair: Rumors, footprints, lines of sight. Even without a tongue, the streets still talk. Listen close enough, and they'll tell you how to find any mark. But it's not me that pays for 'em to die—it's the streets.

Pirate.name: Pirate
Pirate.baseFlair: Arr, I've always been a wrong'un, but the cap'n welcomed me with open arms! I'll never forget what he did for me. I'll give my life to protect him!
Pirate.evoFlair: Arrr harrr! Do yer worst! As long there's still life in me bones, I won't let any of ye go near the cap'n. If ye want to get to him, ye'll need to get past me first!

Viking.name: Viking
Viking.baseFlair: Harrr! I was here first! I won't let ye jump the queue and pinch me prey!
Viking.evoFlair: Take all ye like an' give nothing back! That's how it is on the high seas! Well? Are ye starting to see how proud we Vikings are?

Fortress Guard.name: Fortress Guard
Fortress Guard.baseFlair: I will not allow this fortress to fall! I must hold out until backup arrives!
Fortress Guard.evoFlair: There are injured soldiers inside the fortress, so I must not abandon my post no matter how difficult it be! Any enemies who enter will do so over my dead body!

Navy Lieutenant.name: Navy Lieutenant
Navy Lieutenant.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give Ward to all allied Officer followers.
Navy Lieutenant.baseFlair: There can be no higher calling than bringing order to the high seas. Unfettered freedom across the seas is only possible when order reigns supreme.
Navy Lieutenant.evoFlair: When facing the nefarious pirates, spare not the rod of justice, as cruel and harsh as it may be. Peace must be maintained! Now hoist our colors, so that all may know who rules these waves!

Pompous Princess.name: Pompous Princess
Pompous Princess.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random 1-play point follower from your deck into play.
Pompous Princess.baseFlair: I am the princess who governs this kingdom, and you are my humble servant! Now, go! Bring me the heads of those who dare to cross me!
Pompous Princess.evoFlair: I am an impartial ruler: gods and men alike shall fear me equally! Now sing for me, humble servant! Sing a requiem for those about to die! A-ha-ha-ha!

Ruthless Assassin.name: Ruthless Assassin
Ruthless Assassin.baseEffect:
Bane.
Fanfare: Gain Storm if an allied Commander card is in play.
Ruthless Assassin.baseFlair: Just give the order, and the target will be disposed of immediately.
Ruthless Assassin.evoFlair: There's always dirty work to do. Luckily, I don't mind getting a little blood on my hands.

Young Ogrehunter Momo.name: Young Ogrehunter Momo
Young Ogrehunter Momo.baseEffect:
Rush.
Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has at least 5 attack.
Young Ogrehunter Momo.evoEffect:
Rush.
Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has at least 5 attack.
Young Ogrehunter Momo.baseFlair: My dream is to be a great ogre hunter like Papa and Mama!
Young Ogrehunter Momo.evoFlair: Don't let your guard down because I'm a cute little girl. After all, I wield the Ogreslayer!

Old Man and Old Woman.name: Old Man and Old Woman
Old Man and Old Woman.evoEffect:
Bane.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Old Man and Old Woman.baseFlair: Once upon a time there lived a little old woman and a little old man. The old man hunted ogres in the mountains, and the old woman washed the ogre hides in the river.
Old Man and Old Woman.evoFlair: They would make jerky from the flesh, a healing powder from the bones, and satchels from the washed hide. The old man and the old woman only grew closer as they aged. Chasing after ogres, they lived happily ever after.

Princess Juliet.name: Princess Juliet
Princess Juliet.baseEffect:
Whenever you play a Commander card that originally costs 3 play points, if this card costs 3 play points, change this card's cost to 2 until the end of the turn.
----------
Storm.
Princess Juliet.baseFlair: An unforgivable deed, an unrighteous encounter. Rescued by her adversary, the general, this maiden's passions burst into violent flame. Alas, love is but a sweet poison—a poison that once swallowed, drags the drinker to the depths of Hades.
Princess Juliet.evoFlair: Even if the heart were to allow it, a thousand soldiers would stand in the way. Their encounter was too late to be tragedy, too brutal to be farce. Alas, this dignified maiden holds her sword and howls to close out the final act.

Lord General Romeo.name: Lord General Romeo
Lord General Romeo.baseEffect:
Whenever you play a Commander card that originally costs 3 play points, if this card costs 3 play points, change this card's cost to 2 until the end of the turn.
----------
Ward.
Lord General Romeo.baseFlair: An unforgivable deed, an unrighteous encounter. The tears of his adversary, the maiden, quietly extinguish this general's passions. Alas, love is but a sweet poison—a poison that once swallowed, drags the drinker into unavoidable despair.
Lord General Romeo.evoFlair: Even if the heart were to allow it, a thousand deeds would stand in the way. Their distance was too great to be tragedy, too brutal to be farce. Alas, this raging general holds his sword and howls to close out the final act.

Nonja, Silent Maid.name: Nonja, Silent Maid
Nonja, Silent Maid.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain Bane if an allied Commander card is in play.
Nonja, Silent Maid.baseFlair: It doesn't matter who you might be. There's a line you cross when you hurt our gorgeous Princess Prim. Stand down, or I'll be forced to take you on.
Nonja, Silent Maid.evoFlair: Princess Prim's gentle beauty knows no limits. All her splendor's making me... Ah, my nose is bleeding!

Valse, Magical Marksman.name: Valse, Magical Marksman
Valse, Magical Marksman.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Holy Purebomb or Fatal Spellbomb into your hand.
Valse, Magical Marksman.baseFlair: Licking your lips at people's kindness and then rending it to pieces... Haven't you had enough fun? Let me put you to sleep nice and easy.
Valse, Magical Marksman.evoFlair: When everything you do's bad, you're bound to attract some shady characters—yeah, ones like me who kill for gold. Now kiss the dirt!

Charlotta, Tiny Justice.name: Charlotta, Tiny Justice
Charlotta, Tiny Justice.evoEffect:
Ward.
Evolve: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Charlotta, Tiny Justice.baseFlair: Charlotta, here to bring evil to justice! Allow me to prove why I was appointed captain of the Lumiel Order of Holy Knights!
Charlotta, Tiny Justice.evoFlair: Haha! Had enough yet? I must say you've made for a most disappointing opponent! What was that you said? What do you mean, pretty good for a little girl! I'll have you know I'm a full-fledged grown-up!

High-Seas Hero.name: High-Seas Hero
High-Seas Hero.baseFlair: When I was a kid, I found a treasure map in a garbage dump. Turned out to be a fake someone had drawn for fun, but it was enough to shake me loose from my narrow little world... to show me what was worth risking my life for! —Autobiography of an Unknown Pirate
High-Seas Hero.evoFlair:
That fake map said the treasure lay beyond an unknown ocean. So I grew up, became a pirate, and reached that very place: An empty land of perfect freedom. In a way, the map was more genuine than its maker knew!
—Autobiography of an Unknown Pirate

Disciple of Usurpation.name: Disciple of Usurpation
Disciple of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Strike: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Whenever you play a Loot card, gain +0/+1.
Disciple of Usurpation.baseFlair: Take and take again. Satiate your cravings; devour the rich and the fat, the poor and the meager. Seize everything, leave nothing.
Disciple of Usurpation.evoFlair:
The Second Step: Thirst
The self is a desert—an endless, hollow expanse. And just as the body naturally thirsts in such unforgiving barrens, so too does the soul. Remember this.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

Ilmisuna, Arms Dealer.name: Ilmisuna, Arms Dealer
Ilmisuna, Arms Dealer.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Put a random spell or amulet from your deck into your hand.
Ilmisuna, Arms Dealer.baseFlair: Ah, the battlefield. I smell customers! A beautiful bowgun for you, this handsome lance for you... There! Now get to killing each other! This is what I live for!
Ilmisuna, Arms Dealer.evoFlair: I love the smell of the battlefield in the morning! And once I've sold out my wares, the real fun can begin. Soldiers sniping each other. Kids being stabbed in the back. Young men's heads flying through the air. Heehee. Hahahaha! Come! Let's dance!

Gelt, Resolute Knight.name: Gelt, Resolute Knight
Gelt, Resolute Knight.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, gain Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
Gelt, Resolute Knight.evoEffect: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
Gelt, Resolute Knight.baseFlair: The silver streak he follows is dazzling and beautiful, giving him the strength and passion to charge forward. He turns to the rest of his gallant fellows, his role as vice captain clear in his tone as he belts, "You either give everything or you're worth nothing!"
Gelt, Resolute Knight.evoFlair:
"Gelt, the other knights and I, we all rely on you so much."
—Amelia, the Silverflash
"Stop that, Amelia. You'll make me blush!"
—Gelt, Resolute Knight

Empress of Serenity.name: Empress of Serenity
Empress of Serenity.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Summon a Shield Guardian.
Enhance (5): Summon 3 instead.
Enhance (10): Give +3/+3 to all allied Shield Guardians.
Empress of Serenity.baseFlair: She is The Empress, patron of motherhood. Nothing brings her greater joy than to nurture those under her care and see them grow. For it is children raised in benevolence who in turn shelter others from the unkindness of the world.
Empress of Serenity.evoFlair: She is the giver of life, drawing her children to her merciful bosom. Turning her gaze to the cradle that is the battlefield, she knows that children rocked by true hardship grow into adults that thrive even in the harshest of places.

Gemstaff Commander.name: Gemstaff Commander
Gemstaff Commander.evoEffect: Evolve: Give an allied Officer follower +2/+2.
Gemstaff Commander.baseFlair: As this realm's protector I do vow: no foe shall step foot on this, our sovereign land, as long as I may stand!
Gemstaff Commander.evoFlair: Bend the knee, and gaze upon these jewels. Where once there knelt meekness now stands pure brutality! Yes, this realm will see you turned to heroes today!

White Paladin.name: White Paladin
White Paladin.evoEffect:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon a Shield Guardian for each enemy follower in play.
White Paladin.baseFlair: As white paladins, we have sworn an oath to serve the gods and protect the mistress. We shall answer any threats to her with our steel.
White Paladin.evoFlair: As long as we stand, none shall touch the mistress. We shall defend her to the last, with our lives if necessary.

Captain Lecia.name: Captain Lecia
Captain Lecia.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers the following effects until this follower leaves play - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Captain Lecia.baseFlair: Give up? Never! I'll be the guardian who protects you all.
Captain Lecia.evoFlair: My dad's reputation... my pride... I don't care about that stuff anymore. I'm not going to let anyone hurt my friends!

Lancer of the Tempest.name: Lancer of the Tempest
Lancer of the Tempest.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Lancer of the Tempest.baseFlair: At the speed of lightning, I am one with the tempest. I won't be caught by the likes of you!
Lancer of the Tempest.evoFlair: With the fury of a raging storm, I'll leave no trace behind. This whirlwind will tear you apart!

Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg.name: Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg
Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Officer cards in your hand, gain Rush.
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Commander cards in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Commander cards in your hand.
Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg.baseFlair: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't lonely. But I have my reasons. I've been tainted by the sinful duty I was given, and as such I have no right to get close to anyone. Eep! U-um... It freaks me out when you get close like that all of a sudden!
Troya, Thunder of Hagelberg.evoFlair: The Thunder of Hagelberg... Even now I am unable to escape my ill reputation. But still, I—Eep! I told you, I'm tainted! A-and either way, it's embarrassing being so close to someone! Wahhh!

Autoblade Patroller.name: Autoblade Patroller
Autoblade Patroller.baseEffect: Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, gain +2/+2.
Autoblade Patroller.evoEffect: Evolve: If another allied Machina follower is in play, destroy an enemy follower.
Autoblade Patroller.baseFlair: Core mutations have led to one new breakthrough after another. If Stampeding Fortress is a weapon best suited to group combat, this blade is one that's fit for cutting down individuals. —War Chieftain's Report
Autoblade Patroller.evoFlair: This gorgeous fortress is as flashy as they come, but nowadays martial prowess isn't everything—information's an important element in the mix. But don't you think this job's a little boring? —Autoblade Patroller to Stampeding Fortress

Lady of the Lance.name: Lady of the Lance
Lady of the Lance.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Commander cards in your hand, gain Bane and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm. Recover 5 play points.
Lady of the Lance.baseFlair: How do you do, my little students of war? The commander's given me the responsibility of teaching you today's stratagem. And it's going to feel great... learning from me.
Lady of the Lance.evoFlair:
All units, divide and conquer. Follow the given route and press the advantage.
—Commanding Officer, relaying orders
Sir, yes sir. I'll stab the kinks right out of them.
—Lady of the Lance, beautifully obeying

Mena, Levin Duelist.name: Mena, Levin Duelist
Mena, Levin Duelist.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: If another allied Levin card is in play, gain +1/+1.
Mena, Levin Duelist.baseFlair: I'm Mena, fighter of the Sky Knights! My role's to punch and punch up a storm! Let me handle this—I'll knock down any enemy!
Mena, Levin Duelist.evoFlair: Even by the Sky Knights' standards, she's an exceptional combatant. Though every once in a while, she seems to forget the strategy. —Albert, Levin Champion

Cinderella.name: Cinderella
Cinderella.baseEffect: When another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, return this follower to your hand.
Cinderella.evoEffect: When another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, return this follower to your hand.
Cinderella.baseFlair: A lovely dress, beautiful jewels, and clear glass slippers. Yes, I'm a princess—at least until the clock strikes midnight.
Cinderella.evoFlair: The spell will fade sooner or later. It’s all right; I understood that. But please just do this one thing for me. When you see this glass slipper, remember me and how I was for that single night.

Mars, Silent Flame General.name: Mars, Silent Flame General
Mars, Silent Flame General.baseEffect: Whenever another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, give it +0/+1 and Clash: Gain +1/+0.
Mars, Silent Flame General.evoEffect: Whenever another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, give it +0/+1 and Clash: Gain +1/+0.
Mars, Silent Flame General.baseFlair: Quietly, oh so quietly my flames grow taller. I'm waiting for it, the battlefield great enough to feed my ultimate flames.
Mars, Silent Flame General.evoFlair: I've waited for this hour—for this moment! I can't stand it anymore! I'll burn until all that's left are ashes and cinder!

Octrice, Omen of Usurpation.name: Octrice, Omen of Usurpation
Octrice, Omen of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Remove all Last Words effects on an enemy follower and give those effects to this follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +2/+2 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points. Recover 2 play points.
Octrice, Omen of Usurpation.evoEffect:
Evolve: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Octrice, Omen of Usurpation.baseFlair: The true enemy of the world is satisfaction. Craving begets desire; desire begets progress. Usurp and pillage; hunger and thirst... So come, let us put this world to trial.
Octrice, Omen of Usurpation.evoFlair: The true benefactor of the world is undying hunger; the eternal craving drives us all. The skies, the land, freedom and desire—soon it will all be mine... So come, let us put this world to trial.

Aether of the Warrior Wing.name: Aether of the Warrior Wing
Aether of the Warrior Wing.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Swordcraft followers that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand. X equals your total play point orbs plus 1.
Aether of the Warrior Wing.evoEffect: Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all other allied followers.
Aether of the Warrior Wing.baseFlair: There is no reason for war. The spilled blood and gun smoke, the blighted land... all are meaningless. So at least... let us grant victory to our children. Let glory heal their wounded spirits.
Aether of the Warrior Wing.evoFlair: No matter how we struggle to protect them, we cannot stop humans from hurting one another. And so, instead, please rest easy. There is nothing to fear... Even should you cast off your earthly shell, I'll be with you.

Tsubaki of the Demon Blade.name: Tsubaki of the Demon Blade
Tsubaki of the Demon Blade.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, gain +1/+1 and randomly destroy 1 of the enemy followers with the highest attack in play.
Tsubaki of the Demon Blade.baseFlair: Cherry blossoms scatter across the imperial capital on a chilly night. A malevolent katana, hell-bent on vengeance, cuts through all manner of opposition. "Taste the vengeance of my blade."
Tsubaki of the Demon Blade.evoFlair: The amount of training that goes into polishing her sword technique is untold, just as the lament over past tragedies is limitless. The moonlit night gives form to the trajectory of her blade as it slices through the air. "The misty mark of the forge upon my blade is the last thing you will see."

Pecorine, Peckish Princess.name: Pecorine, Peckish Princess
Pecorine, Peckish Princess.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, gain +0/+1.
Pecorine, Peckish Princess.evoEffect:
Rush.
At the end of your turn, gain +0/+1.
Pecorine, Peckish Princess.baseFlair: Hiya! How ya doin'? I'm the Princess of Peckish, Pecorine! The truth is that's a nickname, but I'm really fond of it! It's the absolute best!
Pecorine, Peckish Princess.evoFlair: All I want is to eat loads of delicious food with the people I care about... I'll do whatever it takes to make that happen! Here I go! Full speed ahead!

VII. Oluon, The Chariot.name: VII. Oluon, The Chariot
VII. Oluon, The Chariot.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Transform this follower into a VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Gain Ward.
-Summon a Knight.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
VII. Oluon, The Chariot.evoEffect:
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Gain Ward.
-Summon a Knight.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
VII. Oluon, The Chariot.baseFlair:
The weight I bear is that of my noble liege!
Roads! Yield to The Chariot, vehicle of momentum!
Lead us now, my liege, to glory with spear and sword!
Onward we shall ride, forging a path to everlasting glory!
VII. Oluon, The Chariot.evoFlair:
Ride on! The Chariot's wheels score the earth!
Onto the battlefield! Rider and steed move as one!
Valiant knights! Trample the helms of foes underfoot!
Glory is ambrosia on our tongues, and victory sweeter still!

Forge Weaponry.name: Forge Weaponry
Forge Weaponry.baseFlair: One hot blade, comin' right up!

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
Giant Slayer.baseFlair: The little stuff isn't my problem... uh, sir!

Art of the Ninja.name: Art of the Ninja
Art of the Ninja.baseEffect:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then summon a Ninja Master.

Kiss of the Princess.name: Kiss of the Princess
Kiss of the Princess.baseEffect: Give +2/+4 to an allied Neutral follower. Then change that follower into a Swordcraft Commander.
Kiss of the Princess.baseFlair: The kiss of a beautiful princess can turn a frog into a person, or a soldier into a hero.

Assassination Jutsu.name: Assassination Jutsu
Assassination Jutsu.baseEffect: Destroy an enemy follower with 5 defense or less.
Assassination Jutsu.baseFlair: It craws in the dark, like a shadow. It's grip tightens, like a snake. The art of the ninja is not one for theatrics, but enshrouded with murderous intent.

Wee Merchant's Appraisal.name: Wee Merchant's Appraisal
Wee Merchant's Appraisal.baseEffect:
Put a Gilded Goblet and Gilded Necklace into your hand.
Recover 1 evolution point.
Wee Merchant's Appraisal.baseFlair: Only pure eyes can spot pure gems.

Courtly Dance.name: Courtly Dance
Courtly Dance.baseEffect:
Put a random 1-play point and 2-play point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
Enhance (8): Then, put a random 3-play point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play and evolve them. Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
Courtly Dance.baseFlair: Welcome to the battlefield of nobility.

Stroke of Conviction.name: Stroke of Conviction
Stroke of Conviction.baseEffect:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Erika's Sleight, Mistolina's Swordplay, or Bayleon's Command.
Enhance (6): Instead summon 2 Quickbladers, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower, and give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Stroke of Conviction.baseFlair: The blight spreads across the verdant world. Viridia Magna lets loose her howl. Undaunted, a young soldier whispers, "Though my past is carved in blood, my future has yet to be written."

Luminous Standard.name: Luminous Standard
Luminous Standard.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Commander follower comes into play, give it +1/+1.

Glorious Core.name: Glorious Core
Glorious Core.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
