During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, give +1/+1 to all allied followers, then banish this amulet.
Glorious Core.baseFlair: An orb of concentrated firepower. Those who seek glory find themselves drawn to its luster.

Rogue's Creed.name: Rogue's Creed
Rogue's Creed.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers with Ambush.
Rogue's Creed.baseFlair: Hold your breath, still your body, and take your prey.

Castle in the Sky.name: Castle in the Sky
Castle in the Sky.baseEffect:
Countdown (15)
Whenever an allied follower comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 and Storm to all allied Swordcraft followers.
Castle in the Sky.baseFlair: An airborne castle that seems to scorn the earth. Untold power is held there, but the castle still sleeps.

White General.name: White General
White General.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
White General.baseFlair: Men, give me your swords! With pride and dignity in our hearts, we knights shall drive the monsters out of this fortress!
White General.evoFlair: It is in times of difficulty that a man's faith is truly tested! Come, men! We cannot rest until the monsters have been eradicated!

Courageous Knight.name: Courageous Knight
Courageous Knight.baseFlair: I have but one duty to fulfill: to give my life in the service of my king! There is no greater honor for a knight than to fall during battle!
Courageous Knight.evoFlair: My sword may buckle, my armor may crack, but my spirit shall never waver! While breath remains in my lungs, there shall be no rest for the wicked!

Mirage Defender.name: Mirage Defender
Mirage Defender.baseFlair: I take pride in guarding my kingdom, and, as long as I stand, none shall pass through this gate!
Mirage Defender.evoFlair: Their attack has faltered. Now's our chance! Steel your hearts, for now we strike back!

Vagabond Frog.name: Vagabond Frog
Vagabond Frog.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, gain Ambush.
Vagabond Frog.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, gain Ambush.
Vagabond Frog.baseFlair: Looking like this, I've never been one for attention. Hiding is a specialty of mine—whether it's in darkness, the shade of a tree, or a convenient crowd.
Vagabond Frog.evoFlair: I'm not a human, and I'm not a frog. So what am I then? I don't know, and that's why I go from place to place—wherever the wind and my whims take me.

Princess Teena.name: Princess Teena
Princess Teena.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, put a random 1-play point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
Princess Teena.baseFlair: Maybe it's because I've never worn clothes like this, but this dress makes me feel kind of self-conscious. Mmm... It is really soft though.
Princess Teena.evoFlair: I put so much pressure on myself because I was hung up on the past. I guess that's just the way I am. But maybe I can take a little holiday from being me, just for now.

Battlefield Beauty.name: Battlefield Beauty
Battlefield Beauty.baseEffect: Clash: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Battlefield Beauty.baseFlair: You looking down at me because I'm a woman? Ha! You're the one wobbling around in that ill-fitting armor like it was your first pair of heels. I could topple you with a finger!
Battlefield Beauty.evoFlair: Don't step onto the battlefield if you don't know the waltz of war, debutante! I've sent everyone else on my dance card limping off to the cloakroom. Think you'll fare any better? Come on... I'll lead!

Zealot of Usurpation.name: Zealot of Usurpation
Zealot of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Rush.
Strike: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Zealot of Usurpation.baseFlair: Take and take again. Awaken the world to the pain of loss, to grief as deep as Hell. Leave them nothing, that they may know our hatred.
Zealot of Usurpation.evoFlair: There is no hierarchy in tradition's shadow. Linger not on rank or distinction. Steal from the rich and the poor, men and women, young and old. Take money, property, lives. Seize every shred of happiness and well-being.

Floral Fencer.name: Floral Fencer
Floral Fencer.evoEffect: Evolve: Summon a Knight and a Steelclad Knight.
Floral Fencer.baseFlair: Ever seen a knight more ravishing than me? Wait, what do you mean "Yes"? You, sir, will regret that!
Floral Fencer.evoFlair: Told you. My beauty runs deeper than you can ever imagine. Perhaps next time you won't be so quick to dismiss my good form, hm?

Cursed General.name: Cursed General
Cursed General.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Storm.
Cursed General.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Storm.
Cursed General.baseFlair: Where are the cowards in this lot? Where are the unworthy? True knights advance and take honor in charging into the fray. So advance, or I'll cut you down where you stand!
Cursed General.evoFlair: You are no longer people! Each of you is nothing more than a single spear, or a single sword! So advance! Ride! Your corpses will be a bridge to our victory!

Swordsman.name: Swordsman
Swordsman.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
Swordsman.baseFlair: I will not draw my sword at the bark of a mewling pup. If you wish to do battle with me, you need to prove yourself worthy.
Swordsman.evoFlair: You clearly are worthy, so I shall show you my attack. If you survive, tell me what you think!

Jeno, Levin Vanguard.name: Jeno, Levin Vanguard
Jeno, Levin Vanguard.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain Last Words: Summon 2 Knights.
Jeno, Levin Vanguard.baseFlair: Attack me if you dare, youngling. There's a reason they call me the Hack and Slash Leader of the Sky Knights. Care to see?
Jeno, Levin Vanguard.evoFlair: My mission is to free the captain from the bonds of the past for the sake of a brighter future. This axe won't take kindly to anyone who stands in my way!

Shrouded Assassin.name: Shrouded Assassin
Shrouded Assassin.baseFlair: As the hidden blade that cuts down the wicked, I'll purge the darkness that shrouds this land.
Shrouded Assassin.evoFlair: Even as my blade gleams in the darkness, so does it rust from the work that it does. So listen well, you who are tainted by the darkness: I shall cut the evil out of you.

Frontline Cavalier.name: Frontline Cavalier
Frontline Cavalier.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Frontline Cavalier.evoEffect:
Evolve: Summon 2 Heavy Knights.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Frontline Cavalier.baseFlair: In the name of king and country, I shall cut you down. This battle is far from over!
Frontline Cavalier.evoFlair: In the name of king and country, I will not be defeated. The real battle begins now!

Aloadae.name: Aloadae
Aloadae.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Flarewing Spear or Frostwing Spear into your hand.
Aloadae.baseFlair: I am Ephialtes! I have bestowed the body of man with martial art—such is my duty as the sanctified twin! My flaming spear ignites the very skies, scorching the heavens! You shall not escape!
Aloadae.evoFlair: I am Otus. I have bestowed the body of man with cultural art—such is my duty as the consecrated twin. Time itself freezes before my icy spear. You shall not face me and survive.

Mechablade Soldier.name: Mechablade Soldier
Mechablade Soldier.baseEffect: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If another allied Machina follower is in play, deal 2 damage instead.
Mechablade Soldier.baseFlair: Once the cannoneer had thrown the battlefield into confusion, a soldier equipped with a mechanical blade commenced his assault. With this deadly combination of power and speed, our forces have become even stronger. —Commander's Report, Part 2
Mechablade Soldier.evoFlair: The new recruit is performing well. His swordplay perfectly complements tactics involving cannon fire. For enemies resistant to either of these attack methods, we're working on a way to overwhelm them with destructive force. —Battle Log, Part 2

Shadowed Assassin.name: Shadowed Assassin
Shadowed Assassin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers Ambush.
Shadowed Assassin.baseFlair: A girl strides through the darkness, a legion of assassins hanging on her every command. When she gives the word, the night shall be stained with blood once more.
Shadowed Assassin.evoFlair: They call her the blade that brings order. To defend the tranquility of the night, she stains her hands with blood.

Latham, Vanguard Captain.name: Latham, Vanguard Captain
Latham, Vanguard Captain.baseFlair: With every impassioned swing of his sword, a cheer rang up among the rank and file. One by one, soldiers began to follow into the breach that Latham carved out. And the light of hope pushed back the darkness of despair.
Latham, Vanguard Captain.evoFlair: When soldiers rally to a single purpose, they form an army. And it was just such an army that—behind Latham's rallying cry—sought to usher in a new era for mankind, an era built atop the embers of their dark enemies' ashes.

Amelia, Silver Paladin.name: Amelia, Silver Paladin
Amelia, Silver Paladin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Gelt, Vice Captain into your hand. Then, change its cost to 0 if at least 3 enemy followers are in play.
Amelia, Silver Paladin.baseFlair: My father left me with two things: a brave order and ceaselessly honed swordsmanship. With these weapons I'll face my foes!
Amelia, Silver Paladin.evoFlair: The time for tears is over. All that's left is to brandish this sword and fight! I'm sure Father is rooting for me even now from his perch in the heavens.

Dei, Secret Agent.name: Dei, Secret Agent
Dei, Secret Agent.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Evyn, Novice Agent or Infiltration into your hand.
Dei, Secret Agent.baseFlair: Countless traps and snares, and all eyes on the lookout... Only a real agent would be able to slip through unnoticed. All right, I'm going in.
Dei, Secret Agent.evoFlair: Collateral damage? Just another part of the job. The best time to show off is right in the face of danger, right? Anyway, let's keep going.

Stampeding Fortress.name: Stampeding Fortress
Stampeding Fortress.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Stampeding Fortress.evoEffect: Evolve: If you have at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, summon 3 Assembly Droids.
Stampeding Fortress.baseFlair: The concept was so simple that even a child could dream it up: create a massive, peerless weapon. It is that very idea that we have employed to control the battlefield. —Commander's Report, Part 3
Stampeding Fortress.evoFlair: Its power is phenomenal, but that very power has backfired against us. The civilians say it's terrifying, and we can't very well use a weapon that has been rejected by the people. What the world really needs right now is a hero. —Battle Log, Part 3

Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur.name: Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur
Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur.evoEffect:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, restore 3 defense to your leader and this follower. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur.baseFlair: Come on, let me spoil you a little. I always have been and always will be your big sister! So there's no need to be shy! Ready? Here comes a great, big hug!
Shizuru, Sisterly Sabreur.evoFlair: Cooking, cleaning, laundry... running your bath, or even monster hunting! You can depend on me to take care of anything and everything! It's a big sister's duty to look after her little brother!

Prudent General.name: Prudent General
Prudent General.evoEffect: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, summon a Steelclad Knight. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Prudent General.baseFlair: I am the Eight of Swords, officer of observation. Do not move. Do not speak. Observe the battlefield with your mind's eye and wait. When the time for reinforcements comes, you will know.
Prudent General.evoFlair: Some call me the watcher and accuse me of sitting idle. It's not that I can't move. There is simply no need. Observe the battlefield in its entirety, and you will be in a prime position to make the final, decisive move.

Queen Hemera the White.name: Queen Hemera the White
Queen Hemera the White.baseFlair: I am the king of white. But once I was a castle, a rook. That might make me a fraud. But the burning pride and life in my chest are real.
Queen Hemera the White.evoFlair: Many people have been hurt on this monochromatic battlefield. I can't allow any more of it. Sure, my rank is different from theirs, but... I'll color them white!

Queen Magnus the Black.name: Queen Magnus the Black
Queen Magnus the Black.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Queen Magnus the Black.baseFlair: I am the queen of black completely different from pawns like you. Humph, what's gotten into you? Your head's awfully high. Bow before me!
Queen Magnus the Black.evoFlair: I'm tired of this monochromatic battlefield. It's about time to move the hands of the clock forward. Your pitiful lives, your envious pride... all will be colored in ebon.

Mona, Levin Mage.name: Mona, Levin Mage
Mona, Levin Mage.baseEffect: Fanfare: Recover 2 play points. If another allied Levin card is in play, recover 3 instead.
Mona, Levin Mage.baseFlair: I'm Mona, mage of the Sky Knights! My job's to make you feel all happy and energetic! What do you say to getting cheerful?
Mona, Levin Mage.evoFlair: She has a rare ability to soothe the other Sky Knights' hearts. Though once in a while, she seems to intimidate them. —Albert, Levin Champion

Gawain of the Round Table.name: Gawain of the Round Table
Gawain of the Round Table.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1 and Rush.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Commanders in your hand.
Gawain of the Round Table.evoEffect: Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Commanders in your hand.
Gawain of the Round Table.baseFlair: My mission as a Knight of the Round Table is to ensure our victory on every battlefield. And I shall clear the king's way forward across this battlefield as well!
Gawain of the Round Table.evoFlair: I dedicate myself to serving my king, and I vow to bring him victories that will enable him to overcome the chains of destiny! My power will be the foundation for the glories of the future!

Lecia, Sky Saber.name: Lecia, Sky Saber
Lecia, Sky Saber.baseEffect: During your turn, when an allied Officer follower comes into play, evolve this follower.
Lecia, Sky Saber.evoEffect: Strike: If there are no allied Nano, the Dawnblades in play, summon 1. If this is your tenth turn or later, put a Twilight Blade into your hand.
Lecia, Sky Saber.baseFlair: I'm painfully aware of how cruel a place the battlefield can be. I know there are only so many people I can save. But I won't let that discourage me! Please, Nano... Lend me your power!
Lecia, Sky Saber.evoFlair: Thank you, Nano. I can sense the warmth of your kindness and the light of hope that shatters despair! Let's go, Nano! As long as we're together, we have nothing to fear!

Bayleon, Sovereign Light.name: Bayleon, Sovereign Light
Bayleon, Sovereign Light.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when a spell or effect restores your play points, put a King's Might into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Bayleon, Sovereign Light.baseFlair:
"Viridia Magna created Naterra. We cannot oppose her."
Forever dreaming, forever hoping...
"We are Sköll. We seek to confer with the Virtuous Mother."
The Forest King seeks to become the light that will illuminate his kingdom.
Bayleon, Sovereign Light.evoFlair:
"Aye, 'tis certain that Mánagarmr thinks us foolish."
Unwavering eyes peer into the shadow-ridden forest.
"And yet I won't abandon our cause. We will join under one banner again."
The Forest King stands tall, his proclamation delivered.

Beatrix, Undying Blue.name: Beatrix, Undying Blue
Beatrix, Undying Blue.baseEffect:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain the ability to ignore Ward, and recover 6 play points.
Beatrix, Undying Blue.baseFlair: Gah... Can't believe I got stuck in a monster trap... But hah! This should do the trick! Wait... It's not working! No, no, no... At this rate, I'll be stuck here forever...
Beatrix, Undying Blue.evoFlair: Doesn't matter what you throw at me, I'll never yield! Now for my counterattack! Embrasque Sword! Feast on their fate! Immortal Assault!

Rousing Step.name: Rousing Step
Rousing Step.baseFlair: In her passionate dance of encouragement, even cold feet are warmed again.

Brave Intervention.name: Brave Intervention
Brave Intervention.baseEffect:
Put a random Swordcraft follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into play.
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Brave Intervention.baseFlair: To act without strategy is reckless. To act with will is courage.

Breakneck Draw.name: Breakneck Draw
Breakneck Draw.baseEffect: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Draw 2 cards.
Breakneck Draw.baseFlair:
The shogun of the era falls ill, and countless samurai seek to rule in his place. As swords are drawn from their scabbards, the flames of war are ignited throughout the land.
—Hosho Era, Year 23: Breaking Point

Flarewing Spear.name: Flarewing Spear
Flarewing Spear.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower, then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Flarewing Spear.baseFlair:
You weak souls who cower at the cold... I shall burn you to cinders!
—Ephialtes of the Aloadae

Stratagem.name: Stratagem
Stratagem.baseEffect: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
Stratagem.baseFlair: For the good of our next war.

Confront Adversity.name: Confront Adversity
Confront Adversity.baseEffect:
Summon a Shield Guardian and a Knight.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Confront Adversity.baseFlair: I seek not glory from awards or decorations, but to only conquer adversity.

Frontline Ramparts.name: Frontline Ramparts
Frontline Ramparts.baseEffect:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, summon a Heavy Knight.
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Heavy Knight.
Frontline Ramparts.baseFlair: Behind this wall are allies I must protect. Before this wall are enemies I must defeat. That's why I stand here. —Nameless soldier

Royal Banner.name: Royal Banner
Royal Banner.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied Officer followers.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
Royal Banner.baseFlair: All who dare speak ill of our flag are traitors!

Ninja Master.name: Ninja Master
Ninja Master.baseFlair: Dead men tell no tales, so the saying goes. It's true enough, in my experience.
Ninja Master.evoFlair: The dead may not speak, but your corpse will let the world know what I'm capable of—make no mistake.

Sentry.name: Sentry
Sentry.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an allied Commander card is in play.
Sentry.baseFlair: Halt. Beyond here lies the domain of my lord. As long as I live, none shall pass.
Sentry.evoFlair: Let fly your arrows; humble me with your hordes. But mark my words: No harm shall befall my ward.

Assault Commander.name: Assault Commander
Assault Commander.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers +1/+0.
Assault Commander.baseFlair: Glorious victory awaits us at the end of this battle. But to get there we must advance! Advance!
Assault Commander.evoFlair: If we prevail here, trust that peace will come. So advance, and never look back!

Avant Blader.name: Avant Blader
Avant Blader.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put 2 random Officer cards from your deck into your hand.
Avant Blader.baseFlair: Time to open a way! Stay right behind me, everyone!
Avant Blader.evoFlair: Your armor can't stop this sword! Consider yourself warned if you'd stand in my way!

Tristan of the Round Table.name: Tristan of the Round Table
Tristan of the Round Table.baseEffect: Fanfare: If an allied Commander follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Tristan of the Round Table.
Tristan of the Round Table.baseFlair: As a Knight of the Round Table, I have a duty to fulfill, and I will allow nothing to stop me from seeing it done. Never will I forget that there is a place for me waiting by her side!
Tristan of the Round Table.evoFlair: The quiet pain in my chest... my thirst for everything you are... All must be suppressed to fulfill my knightly duty. I must aid my king in building his regal paradise!

Kunoichi Master.name: Kunoichi Master
Kunoichi Master.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Kunoichi Trainee.
Kunoichi Master.baseFlair: If you try to harm my liege, then I'll serve as your adversary. I've come from the darkness to take your lives!
Kunoichi Master.evoFlair: My life exists for the sake of my liege. I'll dispatch any of his enemies!

Pollux.name: Pollux
Pollux.baseEffect: Fanfare: Evolve this follower if there is an allied non-Swordcraft follower in play.
Pollux.baseFlair: Next I shall sing your praises, Castor! Brilliant horseman, superb tactician—an unlucky arrow sent you to Hades, your sublimity untarnished.
Pollux.evoFlair: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends the heavens and reaches the gods, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

Castle Guardian.name: Castle Guardian
Castle Guardian.baseFlair: My liege, are you unharmed? Rest assured, your safety is of utmost importance.
Castle Guardian.evoFlair: My liege, are you unharmed? Fear not, we shan't let a single shred of harm touch you.

Levin Scholar.name: Levin Scholar
Levin Scholar.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Levin cards (excluding Levin Scholar) from your deck into your hand.
Levin Scholar.baseFlair: Sigh... Mysterious ruins are always such a head-splitting challenge. But if it's arithmetic prowess you seek, I'd be glad to be of assistance. All calculations are, in essence, puzzles. And every puzzle has an answer. I won't disappoint.
Levin Scholar.evoFlair: Very well, I promise to give every puzzle my all... Actually, hm... What an unexpected turn of events. I can't read a single word.

Strikelance Knight.name: Strikelance Knight
Strikelance Knight.baseEffect: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, evolve this follower.
Strikelance Knight.baseFlair: The way I see it, one soldier is both a force unto herself and part of a greater force. Many of our brethren have paved the way, so that someone might deal the foe a crushing blow. If I'm chosen to be the spearhead, my victory will be your victory as well.
Strikelance Knight.evoFlair: Oh, glorious day. I've been chosen to carry the hopes of my comrades. But please, don't forget: the reason my lance can deal this final blow is because you, my brothers and sisters in arms, have pierced a path to victory.

Percival.name: Percival
Percival.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Officer followers in play.
Percival.baseFlair: Let resolve be my sword, virtue my guide. And may this cursed blood that courses through my veins never succeed in seeing me fall from grace.
Percival.evoFlair: I have proved myself as a knight. Now crimson-draped with Holy Lance in hand, I seek the Holy Grail. I will see my desires come true, and I will bring glory to my king!

Noble Knight.name: Noble Knight
Noble Knight.baseFlair: Reinforcements, when called upon, serve one purpose: turning the tide of battle! Come, comrades, our time is now!
Noble Knight.evoFlair: We shall show you no quarter, vile beasts. Step aside now, or face certain doom where you stand!

Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.name: Monika, Cloudhall Admiral
Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.baseFlair: Don't be fooled by my appearance. I'm a seasoned officer tempered in the fires of battle! Now, my proud warriors, take to the skies with me!
Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.evoFlair: With this sword, I'll fight for the people of Valeria... Hey! Quit patting my head! I'm an airship admiral, so show a little respect!

Luminous Mage.name: Luminous Mage
Luminous Mage.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Summon a Luminous Knight.
Can evolve an allied Commander follower each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
Luminous Mage.evoEffect: Can evolve an allied Commander follower each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
Luminous Mage.baseFlair: To end this age of darkness, we sacrificed our names. Now advance, knight, until this world at last knows peace.
Luminous Mage.evoFlair: Ours is the magic of light infused with the prayers of the people and the wishes of those who fight beside us. And we shall turn the power of hope to light!

Swift Tigress.name: Swift Tigress
Swift Tigress.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 3 play points.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm.
Swift Tigress.baseFlair:
You fleet-footed felines leap through the air with such fluidity and grace. Your erratic movements confound the enemy! Before they can recover from their confusion, our voices rise in cries of victory!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
Swift Tigress.evoFlair:
You fleet-footed felines possess bodies that require no rest, allowing you to advance through the most treacherous terrain with ease. March on to new battlefields, and show the enemy your pride as beastfolk!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

Quickdraw Maven.name: Quickdraw Maven
Quickdraw Maven.baseEffect:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, evolve it.
Quickdraw Maven.baseFlair:
The battles rage on, one after another. The people, the emperor, even the rice fields are exhausted. Eventually the only ones left fighting in the great war are the samurai.
—Ranno Era, Year 4: Changing Times
Quickdraw Maven.evoFlair:
By the blood of five generations of emperors, along with countless rulers and samurai alike, the long battle finally comes to an end. There is no one left for the samurai to cut down.
—Bunji Era, Year 5: War's End

White Ridge Swordsman.name: White Ridge Swordsman
White Ridge Swordsman.evoEffect:
Bane.
Ward.
Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
White Ridge Swordsman.baseFlair: The sword was embedded within the white ridge for ages until fate entrusted it to one young man. The sword spoke to him, saying, "I am thy blade!"
White Ridge Swordsman.evoFlair: The young man nodded, and the white ridge blade shone. Having revealed its true form, it began to speak: "I am thy blade, and thou art my comrade! I shall bring you victory!"

Sky Gladiator.name: Sky Gladiator
Sky Gladiator.baseEffect:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, that follower can't be attacked.
Sky Gladiator.baseFlair: If you desire wings, sacrifice your possessions. Free yourself from will and reason, for they are irrelevant in the skies. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 1
Sky Gladiator.evoFlair: Recognize the sky not only as a home for birds, but as a new realm of battle. If you desire victory, find the path and take wing to the skies as a single blade. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 2

Apostle of Usurpation.name: Apostle of Usurpation
Apostle of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Apostle of Usurpation.evoEffect: Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Apostle of Usurpation.baseFlair: Take and take again. Do not return until the wealth of this world is back in its proper pocket. Seize everything, leave nothing.
Apostle of Usurpation.evoFlair:
The Third Step: Uproot
The world is full of profiteering thieves and absurd moguls. Steal the soil beneath them, so not a single sprout may take root.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

Giantsbane Swordsman.name: Giantsbane Swordsman
Giantsbane Swordsman.baseEffect: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 6 attack.
Giantsbane Swordsman.baseFlair: I carry a giant sword to fell giant foes. How else would I cut down gods and dragons alike? It is the ambition of every swordsman to learn such technique.
Giantsbane Swordsman.evoFlair: I fell giant foes to make my name giant. Why else would I cut down good and evil alike? It is the desire of every swordsman to achieve such superiority.

Vane, Indomitable Knight.name: Vane, Indomitable Knight
Vane, Indomitable Knight.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 and restore 3 defense to this follower.
Vane, Indomitable Knight.baseFlair: Lancelot, captain of the Order of the White Dragons, has been my best bud since we were little. Yeah... Lancey's really amazing—he's no ordinary childhood friend!
Vane, Indomitable Knight.evoFlair: Of course I worry about stuff! Right now I want to get as good as Lancey so we can fight side by side as equals... I've still got a long way to go though!

Siegfried, Dragonslayer.name: Siegfried, Dragonslayer
Siegfried, Dragonslayer.baseFlair: I pledged this sword to my country. No matter how my honor is besmirched, I cannot falter in keeping my vow!
Siegfried, Dragonslayer.evoFlair: This sword slayed the great dragon—do not presume you'll escape it so easily. Now, time to meet your end!

Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.name: Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.baseEffect:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indomitable Knight is in play.
Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.baseFlair: I've been handed a royal decree from the king to seek knowledge that will benefit our country, but I don't even know where to begin... I think I'll start by observing other lands.
Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.evoFlair: There must be something I can do for the people of this kingdom... but what? What should a knight protect? That's the question I have to answer.

Percival, Lord of Flames.name: Percival, Lord of Flames
Percival, Lord of Flames.baseEffect:
Gain Rush while an allied Siegfried, Dragonslayer is in play.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Percival, Lord of Flames.baseFlair: Humph. Plebian riff-raff like this dares to stand in my way to royalty? What insolence. We shall conquer them, vassal! Follow my lead!
Percival, Lord of Flames.evoFlair: I want to build a land without war, where even the powerless can live in peace. To do that, I'll need superlative vassals. Captain, won't you aid me?

Aurelia, Regal Saber.name: Aurelia, Regal Saber
Aurelia, Regal Saber.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each enemy follower in play. If there are at least 3, gain resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Aurelia, Regal Saber.baseFlair: She descended upon the chaotic battlefield, a pristine white flower against the darkness. As her ivory blade danced, the wicked fell before her.
Aurelia, Regal Saber.evoFlair: As a blossom bosoms its precious nectar, so too the knight did shield her wards from harm. As a lady of grace so easily ensnares the gaze of onlookers, so too the flash of the knight's blade did bedazzle her foes.

Albert, Levin Saber.name: Albert, Levin Saber
Albert, Levin Saber.baseEffect:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
Albert, Levin Saber.baseFlair: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
Albert, Levin Saber.evoFlair: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

Barbarossa.name: Barbarossa
Barbarossa.baseEffect:
Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Barbarossa into your hand. Change its cost to 8 if there are 2 enemy followers or less in play. Change its cost to 2 instead if there are 3 enemy followers or more in play.
Barbarossa.evoEffect:
Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Barbarossa into your hand. Change its cost to 8 if there are 2 enemy followers or less in play. Change its cost to 2 instead if there are 3 enemy followers or more in play.
Barbarossa.baseFlair: His beard, crimson like an inferno. His advance, furious like the flames. The people call him the red-bearded king. He is an immortal hero who aids an imperiled kingdom.
Barbarossa.evoFlair: His blades, silver and shining, cut through the flaming dervish of the battlefield. For great prosperity, and for the people's peace, he continues to reign in red-bearded glory.

Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.name: Magnolia, Battlefield Muse
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.evoEffect:
Evolve: Put a random 1-play point and 2-play point follower from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.baseFlair: My valiant soldiers, let my song be the wind at your backs, spurring you on to glory! Be steadfast and never hesitate! Charge!
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.evoFlair: My voice shall bolster your fighting spirit and salve your wounds. Thus armed, any one of you is a hero worth a thousand swords! One more march and you shall hear my victory hymn. Onward to glory!

Swordflash Panther.name: Swordflash Panther
Swordflash Panther.baseEffect:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it. Then give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Evolve another allied follower whose attack or defense has been increased by a spell or effect. Evolve effects will not activate for that follower.
Swordflash Panther.baseFlair: His most impressive feature is that eye of his. Sure, he can read the battlefield like an open book—but that's common enough for all master swordsmen. No, he's got an eye for talent, able to transform those who haven't reached their full potential into true warriors.
Swordflash Panther.evoFlair: Sometimes gossip circles about him: "Is that so-called master actually any good with a blade? I bet he's all talk." I advise those rumormongers to laugh while they still can. His true ability is fearsome; his strikes are but flashes of lightning to the untrained eye.

Albert, Levin Champion.name: Albert, Levin Champion
Albert, Levin Champion.baseEffect:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Randomly put different Levin followers (excluding Albert, Levin Champion) from your deck into play until your area is full.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
Albert, Levin Champion.evoEffect:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
Albert, Levin Champion.baseFlair: A not-yet-champion was born into tragedy. Together with his comrades, he learned the strength of banding together. He reaches out an arm: "Devotion is our power. Into the melee at lightning speed!"
Albert, Levin Champion.evoFlair:
Though he cannot forgive his own sins, he excuses those of others. A frozen heart, a burning pain.
"This tragedy will not happen again—not so long as I have a hand in things!"

Luxblade Arriet.name: Luxblade Arriet
Luxblade Arriet.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied follower has evolved this match, gain Ward.
Then, if at least 3 have evolved, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, restore 5 defense to your leader.
Then, if at least 7 have evolved, draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand.
Luxblade Arriet.baseFlair: Hehe. Are you surprised by my appearance? Right now I'm not the chosen harpist of the gods... I'm an ordinary warrior who fights alongside the people! I'll play for you a song of courage!
Luxblade Arriet.evoFlair: Rather than merely playing my harp from paradise, I want to join with the people to create a new paradise! A mournful melody isn't befitting of a bright future. Come, let the melody of courage resound!

Grayson, Rocket Blader.name: Grayson, Rocket Blader
Grayson, Rocket Blader.baseEffect:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever an allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower attacks an enemy follower during your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Grayson, Rocket Blader.baseFlair: Relying on the brute strength of a single soldier, what an archaic strategy. These days heroes are made on the assembly line. Can you argue with such convenience? No. You can't. Now come—let us reactivate our future legend!
Grayson, Rocket Blader.evoFlair:
Harumph... To trust numbers alone—a foolish notion, that. Shave it down to the core and what's left? Hordes of listless troops? If you won't heed my question, then perhaps the business end of my spear will convince you.
—Patrick, Rhiceros Knight

Amelia, the Silverflash.name: Amelia, the Silverflash
Amelia, the Silverflash.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (7): Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Amelia, the Silverflash.evoEffect: Evolve: Until the end of the turn, subtract 3 from the cost of an Officer follower in your hand.
Amelia, the Silverflash.baseFlair: One cultivates kindness to protect their friends. One cultivates strength to survive. That's what my father taught me, and I will never forget his words! No matter the despair I face, I will cut it in twain with a flash of my silver blade!
Amelia, the Silverflash.evoFlair: Leave your tears in the past and your promises for the grave. That's what he told me, so I won't hang my head any longer. I'll look forward and keep going. Not just for myself—but for everyone who's believed in me so far!

Celia, Hope's Strategist.name: Celia, Hope's Strategist
Celia, Hope's Strategist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon a Shield Guardian and a Heavy Knight.
Celia, Hope's Strategist.baseFlair: Even in the most despair-filled battle, my strategies will come through. Here and now, I vow fresh hope and victory!
Celia, Hope's Strategist.evoFlair: When your hearts are dyed in hope, any hardship can be overcome. All right, victory's in sight! Let's win this battle!

Celia, Despair's Messenger.name: Celia, Despair's Messenger
Celia, Despair's Messenger.baseEffect:
Storm.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each other allied follower in play. Then return all other allied followers to your hand.
Celia, Despair's Messenger.baseFlair: I'll use my power to make this world of hope writhe. Here and now, I vow fresh despair and defeat!
Celia, Despair's Messenger.evoFlair: When your hearts are dyed in despair, the world will fill with pain. And you will be defeated. Let's end this battle!

Onslaught.name: Onslaught
Onslaught.baseEffect:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Summon a Knight if an allied Commander card is in play.
Onslaught.baseFlair: The keen edge that cleaves the enemy lines in two.

Unsheathed Blade.name: Unsheathed Blade
Unsheathed Blade.baseEffect: Put a Swordcraft follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
Unsheathed Blade.baseFlair: A quick flash. Cry of the steel hanging in the air. A head tumbles to the ground before its owner realizes what's happened.

Dualblade Flurry.name: Dualblade Flurry
Dualblade Flurry.baseEffect: Give Rush to an allied follower. That follower can attack 2 times per turn.
Dualblade Flurry.baseFlair: Who needs a shield? Can't even cut anything with it. —Dualblade User

Cyclone Blade.name: Cyclone Blade
Cyclone Blade.baseEffect: Select an allied follower and deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the attack of the chosen follower.
Cyclone Blade.baseFlair: Foes? Allies? Stop talking nonsense! On the field of battle, I don't need anyone but myself!

Dance of Usurpation.name: Dance of Usurpation
Dance of Usurpation.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Dance of Usurpation.baseFlair: If stealing everything they own can't satisfy you, steal even the void that's left behind. Leave not even the sensation of nothingness.

Holy Purebomb.name: Holy Purebomb
Holy Purebomb.baseEffect: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Holy Purebomb.baseFlair: Well, you'll live well in the next world. —Valse, Magical Marksman

Council of Card Knights.name: Council of Card Knights
Council of Card Knights.baseEffect: Summon a Club Soldier, a Heart Guardian, and a Spade Raider.
Council of Card Knights.baseFlair: They say the diamonds fellow slipped up and got his head chopped off.

Round Table Assembly.name: Round Table Assembly
Round Table Assembly.baseEffect: Put 2 random Commanders that cost 3 play points from your deck into play.
Round Table Assembly.baseFlair: It is where twelve heroes sit, all of them brave men of distinguished military service. It is the heart of the kingdom—if not the very world. It is the round table. —Knights of the Round Table, Chapter 3

Dragon Knights.name: Dragon Knights
Dragon Knights.baseEffect:
Choose: Summon 1 of the following followers.
-Vane, Indomitable Knight
-Siegfried, Dragonslayer
-Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
-Percival, Lord of Flames
Enhance (8): Choose 2 instead.
Dragon Knights.baseFlair: For country. For comrades. For dreams. For honor. With an unyielding conviction and dignity beating in their hearts, four knights assume a destiny most noble. In the name of justice and those they wish to protect, they wield their blades.

Twilight Blade.name: Twilight Blade
Twilight Blade.baseFlair: Darkness of despair, begone! Twilight Blade! —Lecia and Nano

Arthurian Light.name: Arthurian Light
Arthurian Light.baseEffect:
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
At the start of your turn, summon a Knight.
Arthurian Light.baseFlair: Follow the point of his sword off into the distance to where the promised land lies.

Support Cannon.name: Support Cannon
Support Cannon.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Commander follower comes into play, deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the attack of the Commander. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead.
Support Cannon.baseFlair: Target sighted! Ready the cannon! Fire! —Captain Lecia

Soldier's Vow.name: Soldier's Vow
Soldier's Vow.baseEffect: Whenever you play a Commander follower, put a random Officer follower that costs X play points from your deck into play. X equals the original cost of that Commander follower.
Soldier's Vow.baseFlair: Loyalty as strong as steel, forged into a blade to strike down sorrow.

Warbound Cavalier.name: Warbound Cavalier
Warbound Cavalier.baseFlair: Reinforcements swept down, not a hoof to be heard. Under a storm of beating wings, the tables soon turned.
Warbound Cavalier.evoFlair: From parts unknown the winged auxiliary soared. Soon its braying led the cheers of victory.

Admiral.name: Admiral
Admiral.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to an allied Officer follower.
Admiral.baseFlair: Massaging the egos of your men will only bring you grief. You there! Don't just stand around! An instant of laziness like that in battle and you're a goner!
Admiral.evoFlair: Listen up and listen well, men! Lack of concentration is the first step to a watery grave! Focus on the task at hand, and see that your enemy beats you to the bottom!

Swordwhip Maid.name: Swordwhip Maid
Swordwhip Maid.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if an allied Commander card is in play.
Swordwhip Maid.baseFlair: You have nothing to worry about, my dear master. Once they tangle with me, the fiends in pursuit will run for cover.
Swordwhip Maid.evoFlair: To be praised by you is an honor of which I am not worthy, sir. By way of thanks, I'll wield this whip as only I can!

Axe Destroyer.name: Axe Destroyer
Axe Destroyer.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Axe Destroyer.baseFlair: It's not just things you can see that I crush. I also crush the spirits of fools who think they can beat me just because they're men.
Axe Destroyer.evoFlair: It's the hour of conquest! Your land, your history, and your pride are all about to be crushed!

Petalwink Paladin.name: Petalwink Paladin
Petalwink Paladin.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Petalwink Paladin.evoEffect: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Petalwink Paladin.baseFlair:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I never fail to wink!"
"Eek! It's her!"
"I hear she can fell her foes with one eye closed!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers
Petalwink Paladin.evoFlair:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I give even my enemies a proper greeting!"
"Eek! We surrendered! Why's she coming this way!"
"Quit waving back at her, you dolt! Retreat! Retreeeat!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers

Sage Commander.name: Sage Commander
Sage Commander.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Sage Commander.baseFlair: Battle awaits, recruits. Fear not what lies ahead, for victory is ours for the taking!
Sage Commander.evoFlair: Victory is already ours. How can I be so sure, you ask? Simple. Every battle is won or lost before it's ever fought, and this one is no exception.

Jolly Rogers.name: Jolly Rogers
Jolly Rogers.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly gain Rush, Bane, or Ward.
Jolly Rogers.baseFlair: Sometimes you lose things, and sometimes you find 'em! But ain't that just how it goes? I got this scary-lookin' hook for instance, so how'd you like to see what this little beauty is all about?
Jolly Rogers.evoFlair: Me hook is so much better than the hand I lost—and it's finding its targets especially well today. So come and have a taste! I'll send the lot of you to Davy Jones's locker!

Mistolina, Forest Princess.name: Mistolina, Forest Princess
Mistolina, Forest Princess.baseEffect:
Accelerate (1): Put a Princess's Strike into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Princess's Strike into your hand. If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, recover 2 play points.
Mistolina, Forest Princess.baseFlair:
"I truly believe we can reach the Virtuous Mother."
Forever noble, forever brave...
"So, please. Won't you put down your swords?"
The Princess addresses the radicals, hoping to bring an end to the conflict.
Mistolina, Forest Princess.evoFlair:
"It is the duty of the Forest Princess to guide the lost."
A tender heart, a steely resolve...
"And she mustn't be stifled by overzealous retainers, mm?"
She fights against the laws of nature to protect the meek.

Sea Queen Otohime.name: Sea Queen Otohime
Sea Queen Otohime.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Bodyguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
Sea Queen Otohime.baseFlair: Welcome, dear guest. Rest a while. My home is your home. Oh? Something precious eludes your grasp? Please do tell. Let us discuss how I can aid you.
Sea Queen Otohime.evoFlair: The nerve! First you hurry a lady, and then you demand she wait while you prepare! Show a little decorum, would you? Excuse me! My voice will be heard, and no, you will not leave me here under any circumstances!

Tsubaki.name: Tsubaki
Tsubaki.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
Tsubaki.baseFlair: A still-raw rancor is to blame for this cursed soul's arrival at the capital gates, and only vengeance for a love betrayed will see her leave.
Tsubaki.evoFlair: Tears of desperation and her companion's blood lend a dark sheen to her sword. Her enemy will one day learn that her devotion to her cause shines with the same intensity.

Darksaber Melissa.name: Darksaber Melissa
Darksaber Melissa.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain -X/+Y. X equals the number of other allied followers in play, and Y equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Darksaber Melissa.evoEffect:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Darksaber Melissa.baseFlair: Within the flames of battle, dark petals dance—bringing further pain and begetting madness into the world.
Darksaber Melissa.evoFlair: The vehement black flower wields its blade in search of the strong, taking form as a woman—her dancing silhouette and sword as fast as the wind.

Spartacus.name: Spartacus
Spartacus.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
At the end of your turn, put 2 random Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Spartacus.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, put 2 random Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Spartacus.baseFlair: This world is home to those without swords. It is home to those who cannot stand. That is why I am here. I am the sword of the weak, and I act as their courage!
Spartacus.evoFlair: Who said you cannot battle? Who said you were a coward? Do not worry, for I am here. Raise your sword and your spirits!

Zeta, Crimson Lancer.name: Zeta, Crimson Lancer
Zeta, Crimson Lancer.baseEffect:
Rush.
Strike: Put a Beatrix, Undying Blue into your hand if there is no allied Beatrix, Undying Blue in play or your hand.
Zeta, Crimson Lancer.baseFlair: Damn it, Bea! Where the hell did you go? Sometimes I think she gets in trouble just for the attention!
Zeta, Crimson Lancer.evoFlair:
Grrr... Seriously, Bea? You ran off alone and got captured by the enemy again? When this is over, I'm gonna chew your head off!
Spear of Arvess! Show 'em your power!

Ironfist Beast Warrior.name: Ironfist Beast Warrior
Ironfist Beast Warrior.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Put a random Swordcraft follower (excluding Ironfist Beast Warrior) from your deck into your hand. Subtract 2 from its cost.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Subtract 9 from its cost instead.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.evoEffect: Evolve: Give all other allied Swordcraft followers Rush.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.baseFlair: He may appear different, but his heart is one with his comrades, as is his loyalty to the motherland and his love for its citizens. With a mighty roar, he storms the battlefield.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.evoFlair: In this fist is naught but pure will—a will to serve the motherland, a will to live with compassion. With a majestic howl, the iron beast storms into battle.

Diamond Paladin.name: Diamond Paladin
Diamond Paladin.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Diamond Paladin.evoEffect:
Rush.
Evolve: Give -4/-0 to an enemy follower.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Diamond Paladin.baseFlair: I am perfection, flawless beauty personified. But that's not enough. No words can ever do me justice. So, let's finish this battle to perfection—finding a befitting solution is going to take me all night.
Diamond Paladin.evoFlair: A flawless recon mission, preparations are complete. But that's not enough. Mere victory means nothing to me. So, let's teach them the meaning of utter defeat—only then can I find the last piece to become complete.

Alwida's Command.name: Alwida's Command
Alwida's Command.baseEffect: Summon a Pirate and a Viking.
Alwida's Command.baseFlair: All right, you louts! Finish this up!

Koga Kunoichi.name: Koga Kunoichi
Koga Kunoichi.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Koga Kunoichi.
Koga Kunoichi.baseFlair: If you can't evade my attacks, death is all that's left for you.
Koga Kunoichi.evoFlair: My bunshin clone is like a shadow, but the pain it inflicts is very real. I'll paint the night red with these twin blades.

Madlance Centaur.name: Madlance Centaur
Madlance Centaur.baseEffect:
If this card is discarded, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
Madlance Centaur.baseFlair:
Everything lay in ruins: weapons, soldiers, buildings. That single attack sent all who approached flying.
Everything was laid waste: his body, his heart, his mind. Each swing shredded something deep within him.
Madlance Centaur.evoFlair:
It was a lance. A single lance.
It was made to pierce, sever, and destroy.
He was a man. A solitary man.
He merely forgot everything but destruction.

Frontguard General.name: Frontguard General
Frontguard General.baseEffect:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Fortress Guard.
Frontguard General.evoEffect:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Fortress Guard.
Frontguard General.baseFlair: What a vicious force! What a savage onslaught! So this is the power of our enemy. I'll just have to hold out until the reinforcements arrive!
Frontguard General.evoFlair: Even if I fall, my friends will avenge me. I have nothing to fear, so prepare yourselves! I come for you!

Alyaska, Master Dealer.name: Alyaska, Master Dealer
Alyaska, Master Dealer.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select 1 card in your hand and discard the rest. Draw a card for each card you discarded.
Alyaska, Master Dealer.baseFlair: Death is sacred. Birth is holy. That's why I love the battlefield. It shines bright with miracles! Life and death, chance and fate intertwine in this all-enveloping drama. War is an act of love... That's why I sell arms.
Alyaska, Master Dealer.evoFlair: The warm glow of burning buildings. The screams. The chorus of friendly fire. The tears of joy and shouts of welcome from the ramparts when the army returns victorious. War is so exquisite—humanity will never outgrow it. Come then! We have miracles to sell!

Azord, Duke of the Mists.name: Azord, Duke of the Mists
Azord, Duke of the Mists.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Azord, Duke of the Mists.baseFlair: All value lies in strength. Weaklings are no more than rubbish. If you wish to defeat me and prove your own worth, you must first show you have what it takes.
Azord, Duke of the Mists.evoFlair: I see. It seems you are not as foolish and weak as I had assumed. Very well. I shall determine the worth of your neck with my blade.

Honored Frontguard General.name: Honored Frontguard General
Honored Frontguard General.baseEffect:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Last Words: Summon a Shield Guardian, and give it +X/+X. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved during this match.
Honored Frontguard General.baseFlair:
We asked why he fights, why he's stood tall.
"The wicked forces encroaching," he answered while facing their onslaught. "Now watch me clear the way!"
His stance on the battlefield was all the explanation his actions required.
Honored Frontguard General.evoFlair: Thousands of blades, myriads of arrows, and millions of spells assaulted him. Yet he did not flee or throw his arms in the air. Trusting in his brother-in-arms, he flung aside fear and fought through to the very end. That is why we shout—to say look at these imposing shields.

Roland the Incorruptible.name: Roland the Incorruptible
Roland the Incorruptible.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Durandal the Incorruptible if there isn't an allied Durandal the Incorruptible in play.
Roland the Incorruptible.baseFlair: A proud hero in the service of a kingdom destined for glory. She charges across the battlefield, holding her holy sword Durandal high for the sake of her homeland.
Roland the Incorruptible.evoFlair: Durandal flashes white each time it's brought down, and every shining afterimage it leaves in the air brings further glory to her kingdom.

Arthur, Knight King.name: Arthur, Knight King
Arthur, Knight King.baseEffect: Fanfare: Randomly put different Swordcraft followers that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into play until your area is full.
Arthur, Knight King.baseFlair: The battle went silent as soon as it started. The soldiers unsheathed their blades and raised their shields, all in the name of the Knight King. With the tips of their swords, they seek the promised land.
Arthur, Knight King.evoFlair: Almost as if predestined, enemies are felled and evil is defeated, all in the name of the Knight King. At the end of their grueling journey, the promised land awaits them.

Blazing Lion Admiral.name: Blazing Lion Admiral
Blazing Lion Admiral.baseEffect:
Rush.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if 15 or more allied followers have been destroyed during this match, invoke this card.
Strike: Give all other allied followers +1/+1.
Blazing Lion Admiral.evoEffect:
Rush.
Strike: Give all other allied followers +1/+1.
Blazing Lion Admiral.baseFlair:
The exhaustion of conflict sucks at an army's boots like muddy ground. When his troops foundered in the swamp of despair, the lionhearted hero stepped forth, clad in flames, and rattled the heavens with his roar:
"Set your despair ablaze. Reduce your enemies to ash!"
Blazing Lion Admiral.evoFlair: The lion's roar roused his allies and froze his foes. Despair burned away, leaving only the thirst for victory. The balance had been broken. And so they pressed onward to glory. "Pit the fire in your hearts against the foe. Blaze our trail to the future!"

Johann, Ironforged Hero.name: Johann, Ironforged Hero
Johann, Ironforged Hero.baseEffect:
Whenever an allied Machina follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Rush.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Johann, Ironforged Hero.evoEffect:
Rush.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Johann, Ironforged Hero.baseFlair: A hero emerged that day from among the masses. Despite his imposing appearance, the man who protected the people from the enemy invasion was showered with applause. —Commander's Report, Part 4
Johann, Ironforged Hero.evoFlair: I am honored to have been presented with such cutting-edge equipment, despite being a mere commoner. I vow to meet everyone's expectations by seizing victory in the next battle.

Alwida, Pirate Queen.name: Alwida, Pirate Queen
Alwida, Pirate Queen.baseEffect:
Accelerate (4): Randomly summon 2 of the following - Cannoneer, Buccaneer, or Marine Raider.
----------
Once on each of your turns, when you play a Loot card, summon a Pirate and Viking.
Alwida, Pirate Queen.evoEffect: Once on each of your turns, when you play a Loot card, summon a Pirate and Viking.
Alwida, Pirate Queen.baseFlair: I am the law of the sea! I plunder as I please, show my might, and accept no limits to my seafarin'! I am the queen—she who sees o'er the seas!
Alwida, Pirate Queen.evoFlair:
"In this world—more'n anyone else—the queen does as she pleases!"
"The cap'n's mighty all right! That why I'm with 'er!"
"Alwida's out of her mind, so we never get bored!" —Alwida's band of pirates

Regal Wildcat.name: Regal Wildcat
Regal Wildcat.baseEffect:
Accelerate (4): Summon a Steelclad Knight, a Heavy Knight, and a Knight.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give another allied follower +2/+2 and Storm.
Regal Wildcat.baseFlair: A skilled hawk hides its talons, but a ferocious tiger bares its fangs for all to see. No amount of strategy, artifice, or cunning intimidates the beast, as it only cares about mowing down the enemy.
Regal Wildcat.evoFlair: The mighty army crumbles, but the wise tiger sharpens its fangs. The beast tears open a formidable stronghold once said to be unconquerable. Though man may know pride, tigers are incapable of such folly.

Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.name: Patrick, Rhiceros Knight
Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.baseEffect:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If it is your turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Natura cards that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, recover 6 play points.
Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.baseFlair: Harumph... The crash accomplishes more and more every day. The fruits of my guidance cannot be measured by the naked eye, but no matter. I can see the efforts of my troops, and it is wild perfection. One for the crash and the crash for one!
Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.evoFlair:
Wow... You still train your troops like that? How traditional, leaving the heavy lifting to a handful of commanders. Isn't our way less complicated? If one of your soldiers fall, just replace them!
—Grayson, Rocket Blader

VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.name: VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot
VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.baseEffect:
Can't attack.
At the end of your turn, randomly deal X damage to an enemy or another ally and then Y damage to this follower. X equals this follower's attack and Y equals the attack of the follower or leader damaged (leaders have 0 attack). Do this 2 times.
VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.baseFlair:
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.
Chariots may need drivers, but I will hold the reins.
VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.evoFlair:
I rampage as I please; my liege can only watch.
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.

Durandal the Incorruptible.name: Durandal the Incorruptible
Durandal the Incorruptible.baseEffect: All allies can't take more than 4 damage at a time from followers, spells, effects and amulets.
Durandal the Incorruptible.baseFlair: A holy sword bound to a certain proud hero. Its blade will shine for eternity, never to break or tarnish.

King of the Horned Crown.name: King of the Horned Crown
King of the Horned Crown.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
King of the Horned Crown.evoEffect: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
King of the Horned Crown.baseFlair: You stand there without permission—in my territory and so disorderly! If you've come by mistake, be carved; if you've come with purpose, be carved!
King of the Horned Crown.evoFlair: If you're in my territory, then you belong to me. Aren't you concerned about how I will handle your life? You'll be diced and dead.

Impact Soldier.name: Impact Soldier
Impact Soldier.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Impact Soldier.baseFlair: He once had a brother who took pride in his strength. That very same brother had his life eaten away by the flames of war. Now, wielding a weapon unintentionally passed on to him, he wades into battle and calmly states, "You're gonna feel the impact."
Impact Soldier.evoFlair: That boisterous laughter and those cheerful and carefree days have left him. Despite this, he has to continue on, reminding himself, "Lotta fightin' left. But I'm not out here just for me."

Enraged General.name: Enraged General
Enraged General.baseEffect: Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Enraged General.baseFlair: You did well to hold out in my absence, but now I have returned, and our victory is assured! The time has come for us to strike back!
Enraged General.evoFlair: Hear me well, evil creatures. My soldiers have suffered and fallen at your hands, and so I must take your lives in return! Your heads shall adorn the graves of the fallen!

Dragonewt Charlotte.name: Dragonewt Charlotte
Dragonewt Charlotte.baseFlair: Umm... can I help? It's just... you do realize you've stumbled into a dragon's domain, don't you? Sorry to have to ask, but... would you object if I skipped straight to chastising you?
Dragonewt Charlotte.evoFlair: I suppose foregoing the formalities wouldn't hurt just this once. I don't often entertain guests, you see, and—oh my, where are my manners? Please rest a while, and feel free to occupy yourself with this little one while I call for help.

Fangblade Slayer.name: Fangblade Slayer
Fangblade Slayer.baseEffect:
Rush.
Bane.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Fangblade Slayer.evoEffect:
Rush.
Bane.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Fangblade Slayer.baseFlair: I was born with superhuman strength, and it caused all kinds of trouble for my mother. Still, packing the strength of a giant has its uses, such as being able to cut down stone dragons!
Fangblade Slayer.evoFlair: Stone dragons, fire dragons, flying dragons... Hardly worth the effort of showing up! Bring me big, bad, god-level dragons! I'll chop 'em up and make 'em into gifts for my mother!

Captain Walfrid.name: Captain Walfrid
Captain Walfrid.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to all other allied followers. Give all allied Officer followers Ward.
Captain Walfrid.baseFlair: You're the swords and shields of your homeland! You're the handpicked elite bringers of the dawn! Now show our foes why you're here!
Captain Walfrid.evoFlair: This airship represents the height of humanity's wisdom and magical arts, and on it rides hope itself! Now fly with me into the light of dawn and see why they call me the wolf!

Alexander.name: Alexander
Alexander.baseEffect:
Rush.
Can attack up to 14 times per turn.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Alexander.evoEffect:
Rush.
Can attack up to 14 times per turn.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Alexander.baseFlair: The ambitious young Alexander rose up to conquer a vast continent. In place of war horses, dragons of exceptional cunning pulled his mighty chariot.
Alexander.evoFlair: The king's army marched across the continent to consolidate an empire stretching from ocean to ocean. Alexander alone would sit on its great throne.

Hero of Antiquity.name: Hero of Antiquity
Hero of Antiquity.baseEffect:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Hero of Antiquity.evoEffect:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Hero of Antiquity.baseFlair: In his eyes is an authority—a cutting perceptiveness—unique to those who have overcome despair time and again. Though he ages, he remains valiant. Though he grows old, he is a hero still. Halfhearted tactics hold no sway with him.
Hero of Antiquity.evoFlair: The way of the weak is to gaze upon the tides of war and puzzle out a strategy. But the strong need pay no heed to the tides of war. They can sever a foe's schemes with a single swing. Only one thing is, therefore, necessary: the will to advance.

Sky Fortress.name: Sky Fortress
Sky Fortress.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give an allied follower +3/+4. If it is an Officer follower, give it Ward. If it is a Commander follower, give it Clash: Draw a card.
Sky Fortress.baseFlair: Once the royal castle falls, even the greatest kingdom is defeated. Should we not then build the strongest of all castles? —Words of a king
Sky Fortress.evoFlair: Your days are over, you who guard the royal castle in accordance with old custom. Prostrate yourself before the procession of the flying king! —Words of a king

Latham, Honorable Knight.name: Latham, Honorable Knight
Latham, Honorable Knight.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Knights.
----------
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Whenever an allied follower attacks, if there are no allied Knights in play, summon a Knight.
-Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Latham, Honorable Knight.baseFlair: Only despair could be found on the desolate battlefield, utterly devoid of hope. It was then that his voice echoed throughout the forsaken air—an order to counter attack, a promise of triumph.
Latham, Honorable Knight.evoFlair: The soldiers gathered at his blade, where their wills were united as one for glory, for victory, and most importantly, for the people. His heart ablaze with passion, the honorable knight charges into the battlefield.

Selfless Noble.name: Selfless Noble
Selfless Noble.baseEffect: Fanfare: Discard a card. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of the discarded card.
Selfless Noble.baseFlair: The Eight of Cups calls for noble surrender. He smiles upon the faces of the desirous masses and, in calm, measured tones, explains the path of enlightenment: to extend a hand and give to those in need is to gain something far more precious.
Selfless Noble.evoFlair: He gladly divests himself of his riches, buoyed by his philosophy: to hold onto gold and other treasures is to lose everything. One needs only to let go. Those with empty pockets will gain wealth and splendor far beyond imagining.

Leonidas.name: Leonidas
Leonidas.baseEffect: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
Leonidas.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
Leonidas.baseFlair: A true king is not measured by his achievements in life but rather by his ability to inspire his soldiers in death.
Leonidas.evoFlair: He fought with his spear until it snapped, his sword until it shattered, and finally with his fists. The king bellowed as he scattered legions. Even if he'd fallen, his people would have spoken of him long after his death.

Jiraiya.name: Jiraiya
Jiraiya.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Change an enemy follower's attack and defense to 1/1.
----------
Fanfare: Change all enemy followers' attack and defense to 1/1.
Jiraiya.baseFlair:
Long ago, lived the ninja Jiraiya, who learned how to transform into a toad. He married a woman named Tsunade, who could transform into a slug, and banished the fearsome beast Raiju.
—Book of Heaven, The Legend of Jiraiya
Jiraiya.evoFlair:
Jiraiya's mortal enemy, Orochimaru, transformed into a serpent, but Jiraiya exorcised the serpent's spirit with a slice from the Namikiri. It is said that in defeating his rival, he ascended to the heavens a master of his art.
—Book of Earth, The Legend of Jiraiya

Leonidas's Resolve.name: Leonidas's Resolve
Leonidas's Resolve.baseEffect: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, give it +3/+3 and Rush.
Leonidas's Resolve.baseFlair: The great king has fallen. And yet his army continues marching to the cadence of his commands.

Dionne, Dancing Blade.name: Dionne, Dancing Blade
Dionne, Dancing Blade.baseEffect:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
----------
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.evoEffect:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.baseFlair: In this world ravaged by ceaseless battle, would it kill you to at least fight with a little grace? My blade is but a pale pink flower. And like a petal in the wind, your head shall spiral to earth.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.evoFlair: An executioner's blade? Utterly repulsive. Something so boorish and utterly devoid of meaning can't compare to the art of my swordplay. My technique shall paint the earth, as shall your blood.
